name: K18 Leave-in Molecular Repair Hair Mask (Various Sizes) K18 Leave-in Molecular Repair Hair Mask (Various Sizes)
description: Does your hair need some TLC and a little... shaping? To the salon! Treat your locks to this at-home, leave-in formula that's infused with their unique patented K18Peptide that works on molecular level to repair even the most extreme damage! Let's pop on our lab coats for a quick second and give you the science-y low-down on this Leave-In Molecular Repair Mask. The patented peptide boasts a unique sequence of amino acids through the struggling strands to reconnect. The result? Stronger, softer, smoother and bouncier hair that's full of life. Boasting salon-like results in just 4 minutes, this concentrated formula is brimming with moisture magnets and protectors to leave your hair feeling prepped, primed and voluminous. Did someone say luscious locks alert?
how_to_use: Shampoo and rinse. Do not use conditioner, towel dry hair thoroughly, apply Leave-In Molecular Repair Mask and wait 4 minutes. Do not rinse out. After 4 minutes, apply styling products if desired and dry/style as usual.
ingredient: Water (Aqua) (Eau), Alcohol Denat., Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Cetyl Esters, Behentrimonium Chloride, Polysorbate 20, sh-Oligopeptide-78, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Hydrolyzed Wheat Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum), Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Olaplex Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle Olaplex Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle
description: Your hair's new favourite double act, the OLAPLEX Shampoo and Conditioner Bundle combines two of the brand's best beloved products into one easy to follow routine. As your first step, discover the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner, which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.
how_to_use: Please see individual product pages for details.

name: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 45ml Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 45ml
description: The future of hair repair is here in the form of Living Proof's Triple Bond Complex. Think of this as your healthy hair architect that works within your tresses to fortify every strand and help you achieve all your hair care dreams. Used weekly, this intensive reparative treatment is clinically proven to reconstruct damaged hair, while protecting it against future damage to keep your mane in optimal condition. Chemical treatments, bleach and heat-induced damage all take their toll, but thankfully, the Triple Bond Complex is on hand to deliver immediate repair and lasting protection so your hair is restored to a healthy state. Harnessing the powers of a breakthrough, patent-pending technology, this hair saviour repairs and replenishes ionic, hydrogen and covalent bonds. After just one use you'll see immediate results (the impatient amongst us can rejoice), as it will look and feel healthier, with significant improvements being made inside your strands too. Not forgetting about the element of protection, encapsulated cellular oil can be found within this little bottle of gold dust to protect your hair from thermal and UV damage. All of this in a once a week treatment? Our hair care routine is getting upgraded asap!
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Cetyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Isodecyl Oleate, Isopentyldiol, Dioctyldodecyl Dodecanedioate, Sodium Phytate, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Jojoba Esters, Linoleamidopropyl Dimethylamine Dimer Dilinoleate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Ricinoleate, Cyclodextrin, Propanediol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Ceteth-20, Steareth-20, PEG-75 Stearate, Polyglycerin-3, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Caesalpinia Spinosa Gum, Fragrance/Parfum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Gluconic Acid, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Benzoate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene. name: Color Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray 200ml Color Wow Dream Coat Supernatural Spray 200ml
description: An innovative must-have for protecting porous, colour-treated hair, Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. If you colour your hair, your strands are probably more porous and vulnerable to humidity - which means more risk of frizz! Introducing Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray, which 'shrinkwraps' every strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak to prevent frizz and flyaways. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish. Unlike typical 'humidity-guard' serums, Dream Coat will not build up, weigh hair down or make it greasy - and it comes in a handbag-compatible size so you never fall foul of the weather.
how_to_use: Shampoo, condition, towel dry hair, divide in sections. Spray liberally and evenly on DAMP (not wet) hair. Do not apply other styling products to damp hair. Blow dry each section using a brush to hold hair taut. Requires blow-drying to activate. For best results, use every 3-4 shampoos.
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Polysilicone-29, DMDM Hydantoin, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Silicone Quaternium-18, Butylene Glycol, Iodopropynyl butylcarbamate, Trideceth-7, Trideceth-12, Phenoxyethanol, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower, Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Potassium Sorbate, Potassium Benzoate, Citric Acid

name: Olaplex Hair Repair Treatment Kit (Worth £84.00) Olaplex Hair Repair Treatment Kit (Worth £84.00)
description: Starring everything from the dynamic shampoo-and-conditioner duo that's put OLAPLEX on the map to velvety-smooth formulas designed to restore your hair's natural sheen and silkiness, the Hair Repair Treatment Kit unites all of your sought-after staples into one must-have set. Celebrating strength with a scientifically proven routine known to reverse the effects of hair damage, this at-home salon-like experience delivers a surge of hair-renewing hydration that bids dryness a-dew once and for all. Working its magic on all hair types and textures, this efficacious four-piece kit features bond-building miracles that may just have you cancelling that salon appointment after all...
how_to_use: STEP 1 - TREAT: No.0 Intensive Bond Building Treatment + No.3 Hair Perfector™ 1. Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes. DO NOT RINSE. 2. Follow directly with No.3. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. STEP 2 - CLEANSE: No.4 Bond Maintenance® Shampoo: 1. Lather and massage into wet hair concentrating on the roots. 2. Rinse well and follow with Olaplex N°5 Bond Maintenance® Conditioner. STEP: 3 - HYDRATE: No.5 Bond Maintenance® Conditioner: 1. After cleansing with OLAPLEX N°4 Bond Maintenance® Shampoo, apply a generous amount from root to tip. 2. Leave on for three minutes, then rinse.

name: Oribe Après Beach Spray 300ml Oribe Après Beach Spray 300ml
description: Get beachy waves and bombshell-worthy shine with Oribe’s Après Beach Wave and Shine Spray, the ideal shortcut to tousled, touchable waves and sun-kissed shine – without the salty stiffness often associated with wave sprays (or a long, languid day at the beach… if only). With a bespoke ‘beach waves complex’ – featuring hydrolysed wheat protein, pro-vitamin B5 and amber extract – the spray ‘swells’ the hair shaft and creates, wavy, ‘piecey’ texture while also providing light hold, so you’ll look like you’ve just stepped off the St. Tropez shore. Alongside this, a blend of rich moisturisers, plant extracts and oils (including safflower seed oil, marigold flower extract and amber extract) keeps everything soft and silky. If you dream of sultry texture and effortless waves, this is the ideal, nourishing way to achieve them – plus, the über-chic navy and golden bottle is a sublime addition to any hair care collection.
how_to_use: Oribe says: Shake. Spray on wet or dry hair. Tousle to taste and let dry in the St. Tropez air.

name: Sisley Hair Rituel by Sisley Treatment Regenerating Hair Care Mask 200ml Sisley Hair Rituel by Sisley Treatment Regenerating Hair Care Mask 200ml
description: Supercharged with an array of nourishing plant-based actives, proteins, vitamins and minerals, this Regenerating Mask is here to give your locks and scalp an energising boost. Hair Rituel by Sisley's Fortifying Vitalising Complex is the star of this scalp and strand-loving show, alongside rice and cotton proteins to regenerate and rebuild structure from root to tip. Ideal for self-massage, this light and creamy mask also includes a nourishing blend of shea, macadamia, camellia and hazelnut oils to combat dehydration, while soothing and softening your skin and tresses. And true to SISLEY-PARIS' ritual-enhancing collections, it's also infused with a light and fresh fragrance to delight your senses. Don't be surprised if you become obsessed.
how_to_use: Apply to washed and damp hair. Distribute from roots to ends. Massage into the scalp and leave product on for 10 minutes. Rinse carefully.

name: Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil 30ml Olaplex No.7 Bonding Oil 30ml
description: Ultra-nourishing yet completely weightless, the innovative No. 7 Bonding Oil restores and renews your hair without coating it in a greasy film. Quite the contrary, expect silky smooth lengths that shine brighter than the oil itself. Formulated to rebuild the damaged disulphide bonds in your hair, the star ingredient is bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate – sounds science-y but it works to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching or heat styling (and it even works wonders on 'virgin' hair!) Perfect as a conditioning treatment or a styling step (it protects against heat up to 450°!), this oh-so dreamy oil sinks into stressed-out tresses to make them instantly more manageable – smoothing frizz and taming flyaways in its wake.
how_to_use: Turn the bottle upside down and gently tap the index finger on the bottom of the bottle to dispense a metered drop. Apply a small amount to damp or dry hair, style as desired.

name: Act+Acre Cold Processed Stem Cell Serum 2.2 fl oz Act+Acre Cold Processed Stem Cell Serum 2.2 fl oz
description: Healthy hair starts at the scalp, so get to the root of thinning and fall out with Act+Acre’s bestselling treatment serum. Formulated with 2% Swiss apple stem cells to repair the scalp microbiome at a cellular level, the Cold Processed Stem Cell Scalp Serum works to reduce hair shedding within one month of use. These hard-working stem cells have been clinically-proven to stimulate growth and extend the growth phase of your mane, leading to a fuller head of hair over time. Combined with collagen-supporting and scalp-soothing aloe vera and bamboo and pea extracts — known to promote a consistent growth cycle and reduce production of ageing free radicals — this vegan treatment is set to be your new hair care hero.
how_to_use: On clean damp or dry hair — apply 1 -2 pipettes along the hairline and part. Massage into scalp evenly. Leave-on and do not rinse. Use daily for best results.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (ALOE), Bambusa Vulgaris Leaf/Stem Extract (BAMBOO), Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Plant-Based Collagen, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glucosamine Hcl, Glycereth-26, Lecithin, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate (RADISH), Malus Domestica Fruit Cell Culture Extract (APPLE), Pentylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Extract (PEA), Propanediol, Quercus Petraea Fruit Extract (OAK), Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Xanthan Gum.

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 250ml
description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.
how_to_use: Once a week, or immediately after rinsing a chemical colourant, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Gisou Honey Infused Hair Perfume (Various Sizes) Gisou Honey Infused Hair Perfume (Various Sizes)
description: Perfect for gently scenting and refreshing your mane, Gisou’s Honey Infused Hair Perfume is a delicate hair fragrance enriched with Mirsalehi Honey. Enjoy a seductive trace of Gisou’s signature, feminine fragrance every time you swish around your strands, thanks to just a few spritz of this scent. Lightly floral (but never sickly or overpowering) the fragrance is inspired by the brand’s Mirsalehi Bee Garden. The formula is, of course, infused with honey too, meaning your hair is enriched with strengthening, shine-giving antioxidants, vitamins and amino acids.
how_to_use: Divide hair into sections. Spray the Honey Infused Hair Perfume evenly from an arm’s length throughout dry hair. Give your hair a flip to emit the fresh Gisou scent.
ingredient: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance)*, Aqua, Mirsalehi Honey, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Citral, Coumarin, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool, Benzophenone-4, Sodium Hydroxide, Ci 13015, Ci 16255.

name: Amika Dream Routine Overnight Hydration Treatment 100ml Amika Dream Routine Overnight Hydration Treatment 100ml
description: Gone are the days of crunchy coils and curls. Why? Well, because you have the Dream Routine Overnight Hydration Treatment starring in your hair care rituals, of course. Drenching your locks with optimal moisture lasting past the buzz of your morning alarm or blurry night out, this moisture-boosting formula is definitely one to have. Targeting dry, brittle hair of all textures and types, this hyaluronic acid-infused treatment delivers weightless hydration that lasts up to 72 hours and even through four wash days! Taking a skin care approach to hair care, this bottle is brimming with polyglutamic acid famed for moisture-retention, blue-green algae loaded with natural fatty acids and bio-fermented coconut water packed with heavenly hydration — what’s not to love? There’s no need to rinse, jump pump away and feel your split ends grow stronger with every dollop. Pssst — no, this won’t stain your satin pillowcase either, result!
how_to_use: Comb through hair. Pump one to four times into hands depending on hair length and thickness. For fine or thin hair, use one to two pumps. For medium or shoulder length hair, use two to three pumps. For thick or curly hair, use three to four pumps. Apply to dry or damp hair before bedtime. Distribute from mid-lengths to end—you‘re ready for your beauty sleep.
ingredient: Water/Eau/Aqua, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetyl Alcohol, C13-15 Alkane, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Hyaluronic Acid, Polyglutamic Acid, Spirulina Platensis (Blue Green Algae) Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Selaginella Lepidophylla (Rose of Jericho) Extract, Inonotus Obliquus (Mushroom) Extract, Rhodiola Rosea (Arctic Root) Extract, Eleutherococcus Senticosus (Siberian Ginseng) Root Extract, Rhaponticum Carthamoides (Maral) Root Extract, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Sodium Phytate, Propanediol, Glycereth-2 Cocoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Potassium Sorbate, Butylene Glycol, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum.

name: Sisley Hair Rituel by Sisley Treatment Soothing Anti-Dandruff Cure 60ml Sisley Hair Rituel by Sisley Treatment Soothing Anti-Dandruff Cure 60ml
description: If flakiness, itching and irritation are spoiling your day and ‘do, it's time to try Hair Rituel by Sisley's Soothing Anti-Dandruff ritual. Step two in the range, the Cure is an intensive treatment designed to rebalance, calm and purify the scalp. (Glossy, healthy locks are an added bonus!) The Cure is designed to be used alongside the Soothing Anti-Dandruff Shampoo to treat the underlying causes of dandruff and irritation at the root. A non-rinse formula, it's supercharged with the brand's Intense Rebalancing Complex which includes purifying sage and celery seed extract, alongside verbena essential oil and alpha bisabolol. Pro vitamin-B5 is also key for its strengthening benefits, so your locks get some TLC as well as your scalp. Expect instant relief and long-term results - we're talking glossy, silky-soft and healthy-looking tresses with a newfound confidence boost to match.

A round barrel allows for versatile styling, particularly when creating curls, while a staggering 30 second heat up time is a God send on busy mornings. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage.

name: Amika The Chameleon 5 Barrel Interchangeable Curling Kit Amika The Chameleon 5 Barrel Interchangeable Curling Kit
description: With five barrels, The Chameleon 5 Barrel Interchangeable Curling Kit is a must-have for any curl creatives looking to transform their tresses - without overworking hair. The ultimate multi-tasker, the curler's five easy-to-assemble barrels can create looks from tight pin curls through to big, blow dry-esque waves - and everything in between. Worried about causing heat damage to your strands? You needn't be. The lightweight titanium barrels have an ultra-smooth surface that creates extra silky, smooth curls. They also use far-infrared heat that instantly penetrates the cortex of the hair cuticle, reducing damage by heating hair in just half the time of traditional curlers. And to protect your delicate fingers, the kit comes with a heat-resistant three-fingered glove for extra flexibility, without the burn.
how_to_use: To turn on: Press and hold the On/Off button located between the – and the + buttons. To change the temperature: Press the + button to increase the temperature and the – button to decrease the temperature. Changing the barrel heads: the 32mm/1.25"" curler; i.e ""the bump"" - best for creating the round-brush, straight look with movement on long hair. bend the ends of a voluminous 'do, giving it more life. curl and set in large sections using the amika touchable hair spray to get a rounder, bouncier look or curl in different directions to show layers.  The 25mm/1"curler; i.e. "glamour" - the most popular curl size for creating anything from classic or retro looks to modern voluminous styles. curl and set, wait 10 minutes for the curls to cool, release, brush and style for the biggest, bounciest curl. let hair air dry and curl the hair in alternating directions for a classic beachy look. The 25-18mm/.75-1"curler; i.e. "au natural"- curls that are tighter at the bottom, looser on the top with less uniformity. for even more of a natural look, alternate the size of hair sections being curled and between wrapping the curls at the base or mid-length of hair. The 19mm/.75" curler; i.e. "texture" - ideal for creating textured and vintage looks, as well as curls that need to last from day to night. curl entire head of hair as the foundation for a beautifully messy chignon. take a short bob from sleek and pin straight to fun and beachy. The 9-19mm/.35-.75"curler; for bouncy, defined ringlets and tight waves.
ingredient: This tool comes complete with a standard UK plug. 110-240V.

name: Color Wow Travel Dream Coat Supernatural Spray 50ml Color Wow Travel Dream Coat Supernatural Spray 50ml
description: An innovative must-have for protecting porous, colour-treated hair, Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. If you colour your hair, your strands are probably more porous and vulnerable to humidity - which means more risk of frizz! Introducing Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray, which 'shrinkwraps' every strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak to prevent frizz and flyaways. Heat-activated, the effects of this spray last through three to four washes and work to compress, tighten and seal hair strands for a supernaturally sleek, smooth and ultra-silky finish. Unlike typical 'humidity-guard' serums, Dream Coat will not build up, weigh hair down or make it greasy - and it comes in a handbag-compatible size so you never fall foul of the weather.

name: HELLO KLEAN Exfoliating Scalp Brush HELLO KLEAN Exfoliating Scalp Brush
description: Designed to slough away dead skin cells and stimulate the scalp (while offering a much-appreciated at-home head massage), HELLO KLEAN's Exfoliating Scalp Brush is a hand-held device that boosts your hair health right from the root. The perfect partner to the brand's {Scalp Soak} — a detoxifying treatment that fights against product build-up — this exfoliating tool elevates your cleansing ritual, transforming scalp care into self care. Moulded to sit comfortably in the palm of your hand, this circulation-boosting brush gently stimulates your hair follicles with soft bristles, detoxifying from the root down as it sloughs away dead skin cells to promote healthy, lustrous locks of hair. Suitable for straight, wavy, curly and coily hair types, this is destined to become a hair care Holy Grail...
how_to_use: Apply shampoo, massage oil or treatment and distribute throughout the scalp and hair. Hold the brush in your palm and gently press the rubber tips with medium pressure in small circular motions. Repeat on all areas of the scalp. Exfoliating Scalp Brush can be used on wet or dry hair, with or without product. Avoid large circular motions to prevent tangling.
ingredient: Silicone.

name: Olaplex No.6 100ml Olaplex No.6 100ml
description: Betraying its chic, minimalist appearance, this brilliant bottle holds miracles. Equipped with an airless pump that makes for easy application, the No.6 Bond Smoother sends waves of optimal hydration lifeless-looking locks as it conditions and strengthens your strands from root to tip. This concentrated leave-in treatment is an excellent addition to any hair care routine as well as being a must-try for those with bleached, coloured or chemically-treated hair. As much a hair styling product as it is an intensive hair treatment, this also promises to speed up blow-drying time and control flyaways for up to 72 hours as well!
how_to_use: Apply product from mid-lengths to the ends. Start with 1/2 pump for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair. Less for fine or short hair. Comb through and style as desired.

name: Larry King Haircare Flyaway With Me Kit Larry King Haircare Flyaway With Me Kit
description: A must for handling unruly baby hairs and stubborn frizz, the Flyaway With Me Kit unites the brand's beloved A Social Life for Your Hair with a dual-ended bamboo brush and comb. Named after Larry King's ethos - his salon is more than a salon, it's somewhere to chat and relax while your tresses are perfectly pampered - A Social Life for Your Hair is a hard-working hero that tames strays and lends locks a sleek, glossy finish. A super-charged finishing cream for all hair types, ASfYH has a heavenly fragrance (inspired by lazy days spent watching clouds blown away on a warm, balmy breeze), and works to enhance definition, lend shine, control frizz and add 'oomph'. With a looooong list of prestigious nominations, this light, flexible crème is ideal for all hair lengths and textures - from short crops to tumbling curls - and helps to improve manageability (just rake through dry lengths). With a dual-ended bamboo brush and comb to work product through targeted areas (it's great for your fringe and your 'burns), this kit is an über-cute way to discover this wonderful range.
how_to_use: Best used with a tiny smudge of A Social Life For Your Hair to: Smooth out baby hairs around the hairline. Smooth down flyaways for a super sleek high shine finish. Tidy up a sleek ponytail or bun. Lay your edges.

name: HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner 350ml HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner 350ml
description: Dealing with all the tell-tale signs of hard water? Think dryness, brittleness, brassiness and dullness. Meet your new hair hero, HELLO KLEAN Hard Water Conditioner. Specially formulated to counteract the effects of minerals and heavy metals, it restores softness, strength and shine from root to tip. Rinsing away roughness caused by mineral-heavy water, this replenishing conditioner is fortified with reishi mushroom and reparative rice proteins. Hyaluronic acid infuses strands with moisture, to plump up dry, brittle hair, while provitamin B5 boosts hair strength to ward off breakage. Free from silicones, this lightweight formula seals in hydration and adds just enough slip without weighing locks down.
how_to_use: After shampooing, gently squeeze out any excess water. Rub a desired amount of conditioner between your hands and comb through the hair with your fingers. Leave for one minute before rinsing thoroughly.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Milky Leave-In Conditioner 210ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Milky Leave-In Conditioner 210ml
description: A flexible formula that transforms your mane by fighting frizz, detangling tresses, repairing split ends and protecting against heat damage... only Sol de Janeiro could create a leave-in conditioner that smells this good. Deliciously-scented with the lauded Cheirosa '62 aroma of irresistible pistachio and salted caramel... this mist is here to restore stressed-out strands to a healthy and silky-soft state. The first step in your post hair-wash routine to perfectly prime and prep your hair before heat styling, this lightweight mist locks in moisture and blocks out humidity (you'll frizz no more) with 'Babaçu Oil'. Rich in selenium, 'Brazil Nut Oil' protects your locks against breakage and keeps them strong, while thirst-quenching 'Cupuaçu Butter' nourishes strands that are craving hydration. Suitable for all types and textures under Sol's sun, all you need to do is mist, style and go.
how_to_use: Spray on damp hair from mid-length to ends before heat styling or air drying. If using with other styling products, use first. Perfect for restyling or second-day hair - can apply to slightly dampened or dry hair to instantly rehydrate strands. P.s. there's no need to rinse, just leave it (and love it!).

name: Color Wow Raise the Root Spray 150ml Color Wow Raise the Root Spray 150ml
description: Perfect for those with fine, lifeless or flyaway strands, Color Wow's Raise the Root Spray provides long-lasting lift without stiffness or stickiness. Completely invisible, this innovative mist is formulated with unique, completely clear polymers that won't distort your precious colour, while the flexible formula creates an ingenious 'spring' around strands to boost bounce and build body. Suitable for use on wet or dry hair, this keeps your hair soft and aloft for voluminous, head-turning 'oomph' while ensuring your colour stays true (it won't yellow or darken your roots).
how_to_use: Spray onto damp hair, concentrating application at the roots. Style as desired. Alternatively, spritz onto dry hair for instant lift and shape.

name: Color Wow Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer 195ml Color Wow Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer 195ml
description: Answering the wishes of limp-haired beauties, Color Wow's Xtra Large Bombshell Volumizer transforms fine tresses into beautifully thick, full hair for days. Granting major, long-lasting volume without weighing down your strands, this futuristic foam adds texture, body and instant grip to flimsy hair. Safe for colour-treated and chemically treated hair, this non-dehydrating foam thickens your strands without the likes of alcohol, salt or resins that typically create volume by forcing up the cuticle. Instead, it harnesses a proprietary polymer and fortifying bamboo blend to surround each strand, creating volume while allowing your cuticles to remain closed and intact. Giving hard-to-style, limp locks some much-needed texture (think: natural and supple, never stiff or crispy), this essential styler delivers big bombshell drama that lasts for days.
how_to_use: Apply to damp hair. Dispense 2-3 pumps worth of foam into hands and pull through a section of hair from top to ends, continue until all hair is covered. Comb through to distribute evenly. Style. Can be blow dried or air dried.
ingredient: Aqua/Water, Propanediol, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, PPG-26-Buteth-26, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Disodium EDTA, Benzalkonium Chloride, Bambusa Arundinacea Leaf Extract, Polyquaternium-22.

name: Kitsch Satin Sleep Scrunchies (Various Colours) Kitsch Satin Sleep Scrunchies (Various Colours)
description: Minimising damage while looking totally chic, these scrunchies are far more than a nod to the '90s Specially selected elasticated bands are covered with Kitschs Satin Sleep Scrunchies. Whether youre creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate do, this sumptuous silk ensures that you create no kinks or creases while being kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that theres no damage or breakage.
how_to_use: Use to style hair while sleeping.
ingredient: Dacron 96% Spandex 4%

name: OUAI Detox Shampoo Travel Size 89ml OUAI Detox Shampoo Travel Size 89ml
description: Anyone else in the mood for a spa day but for your hair? We know we always are! Definitely going a-OUAI with us for a relaxing self care weekend is this Detox Shampoo. What better way to hit the ultimate reset button than to start with your hair because sometimes a good and thorough wash day is all you need. A once-a-week option for those who're suffering from dry shampoo-dependency that's crammed with hard-working chelating agents which help to remove the stubborn hard water deposits and impurities that sit in our strands, and the hair-loving apple cider vinegar that's perfect for a deep exfoliation to lift the dandruff, flakes and residue. It gets better - heroing hydrolyzed keratin means your tresses will be left feeling softer, silkier and shinier after every single wash. Don't just take our word for it, add to basket and be blown a-OUAI by the undeniable results...
how_to_use: Thoroughly wet your hair from roots to trips with lukewarm water. Squeeze out any excess moisture and lather a coin-sized 'dollop' of Detox Shampoo in your hands. Part hair using fingers and apply Detox shampoo as close to the scalp as possible. Let it work its magic for one to three minutes before rinsing thoroughly.

name: Olaplex No. 4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250ml Olaplex No. 4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo 250ml
description: Betraying its chic, minimalist appearance, this brilliant bottle holds miracles. So much more than your average regular-degular shampoo, the No.4C Bond Maintenance Clarifying Shampoo gently lifts away weighty dirt, debris and build-up from your hair with just one use. Bursting with a hair-renewing pH-balanced blend of vegan nourishment, this sought-after formula restores your once-voluminous locks for the healthiest-looking shine from root to tip. Cleansing each and every shaft with a wonderfully rich sulfate-free lather, this must-try shampoo removes dare-to-stay chlorine, excess oils, hard water minerals and even heavy metals all the while maintaining stronger than ever shafts coated with hydrating heroes! Sounds like better hair days are on the horizon if you ask us.

name: Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Sunset Tie Dye Kitsch Satin Heatless Curling Set - Sunset Tie Dye
description: In a pretty ‘Sunset Tie Dye’ pattern, the Satin Heatless Curling Set will help make all your big, bouncy curl dreams a reality — without causing dryness, frizziness or split ends. Yep, this unusual device, complete with satin finish to prevent unwanted breakage to your strands, sets your hair into place (whether that’s voluminous, ‘fresh from a blow dry’ curls, or texture, beachy waves) without the need for heat. The set includes a foam curling rod, around which you curl your hair, and two scrunchies to gently secure it in place. Once you’re hair is in position, enjoy a good night’s rest (trust us, this is more than comfy enough to snooze in) and release your perfectly curled mane come morning. Curling tongs, who?
how_to_use: 1. Place curling ribbon on top of damp or dry hair and use your favourite Kitsch claw clip to secure in place. 2. Begin wrapping half of your hair around, starting with a section at the top of your head. Secure the ends of your hair with a scrunchie and repeat on the other side. 3. Allow the hair to dry or wear overnight. To remove, take off the scrunchies and loosen the hair, pulling ribbon out from the top. 4. Tousle and style to preference, and say hello to gorgeous hair.
ingredient: 35% PU Sponge, 28% Satin Polyester, 28% Iron, 9% PVC; Scrunchie: 90% Satin Polyester, 10% Rubber; Sponge: 100% Polyurethane.

name: Color Wow Pop & Lock High Gloss Finish 55ml Color Wow Pop & Lock High Gloss Finish 55ml
description: A triple threat to dry, dull and unruly tresses, this innovative styling treatment can be used in three easy ways to enhance your colour and deliver epic shine. It’s brimming with deeply hydrating humectants to smooth your hair from the inside out – 75% of the formula works inside of your lengths to help restore elasticity and suppleness. It only functions as a serum, cocooning each stand with a crystal-clear, high-gloss sheen to smooth the cuticle and lock in the hydrating ingredients. Fitting into your routine no matter what, you can use it as a pre-blowout treatment to retain moisture while heat-styling, as a finisher to break tights curls into shiny waves or as a styling aid to tame frizz and flyaways. Either way, you can expect UV protection, a high-shine finish and no greasy buildup.
how_to_use: For use on wet or dry hair. Apply evenly and style as usual.

A daily restoring and hydrating conditioner, this silky fluid deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in-between your salon or styling sessions so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. description: An essential addition to your on-the-go hair care routine, OUAI Haircares travel-size Leave-In Conditioner ticks all the boxes hydrating, conditioning, detangling and protecting from heat in just a few spritzes. Brimming with even more nourishment from castor oil — the number one natural hair growth secret packed with fatty acids —, scalp-toning dashmool used to strengthen your skin and calm nerves and ashawanganha, an Indian ginseng for total beauty revival, this oily remedy is a sure-fire staple for your routine. name: HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head
description: A hero for skin and hair, the HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head tackles the drying effects of hard water - no plumbing qualification or water softening system required. Simply switch out with your existing shower head to save water, boost pressure and filter out unwanted metals, chlorine and impurities. Featuring an advanced two-step filtration system powered by amino acids, activated carbon fibre and KDF 55, this clever shower head removes water-soluble metals (including lead, iron, mercury and nickel), trihalomethane (THMs) and odour. This softer water is kinder on skin and hair, and the boosted pressure makes short work of rinsing out suds for lightweight locks and happier skin.
how_to_use: Remove the existing shower head. Attach the Purifying Shower Head to the hose and run the water for 30 seconds before using.

name: Fable & Mane HoliRoots Pre-Wash Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil 14.4ml Fable & Mane HoliRoots Pre-Wash Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil 14.4ml
description: An ode to the founders' grandmother’s tradition of therapeutic hair oiling, Fable & Mane's Pre-Wash Strengthening Treatment Hair Oil encourages healthy hair from root to tip, smoothing your strands for a silk-like finish. Now available in the original bottle (55ml) and a sized-to-try vial (14.4ml). Scented with the divine nectar of champaca flowers native to Maduraia, this aromatherapeutic blend promotes a sense of divine self love. As for its hair-loving benefits, it nurtures from the root onwards by stimulating scalp circulation, as well as strengthening and softening your strands. Suited to all hair types, the lightweight, silicone-free blend is infused with ashwagandha (an adaptogen employed in Ayurvedic rituals for millennia) that helps to thicken fine hair, while dashmool promotes healthy scalp circulation to encourage hair growth.

Alongside this, Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) defends hair from oxidative stress, damage and the colour-fading effect of the elements. After use, your hair will feel gently cleansed and royally rejuvenated – plus, the bottle is sure to add a touch of luxe opulence to your bathroom shelf.

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist Hair by Sam McKnight Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist
description: The ultimate secret for achieving sexily tousled, oh-so insouciant texture effortlessly, Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist from Hair by Sam McKnight is the coolest texturising spray youre likely to come across. The culmination of McKnights iconic expertise and experience in the industry, his irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional (yet pleasingly laid-back) standards of styling at home in mere minutes. This go-to texturiser couldnt be much easier to use simply spritz it in, mess it up and, hey presto, youll be channelling Sam McKnights signature done, undone look. Making it a real pleasure to use, the spray is scented with a fresh, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood, crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Spray through the crown, mid lengths and ends. Or throw your hair upside down and spray liberally through the hair and into the roots.

name: SILKE London Frida Hair Ties SILKE London Frida Hair Ties
description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...
how_to_use: Use to tie your hair up, in lieu of traditional elastics which can snap your precious strands.
ingredient: Specially selected super elastic interior, 100% pure silk exterior.

name: Amika The Kure Intense Bond Repair Mask Amika The Kure Intense Bond Repair Mask
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika’s mantra is “all hair is welcome”. Centred around dry, damaged tresses, The Kure Bond Repair Mask is an intensive turnaround treatment that restores moisture and promotes healthy looking and feeling hair. Packed with bond cure technology, it targets the most abundant bonds in your hair, which break the most frequently during daily wear and tear. What's more, it is infused with plant butters (think: mango butter extract, borage oil and shea butter) and vegan proteins to lend the formula an abundance of conditioning omega fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. Your strands will thank you for it! Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production. Now available in the original (250ml) and a sized-to-try (100ml) portion, this hair care hero can go everywhere with you.
how_to_use: After cleansing with the kure repair shampoo, gently massage from roots to ends. Process for 10 minutes with or without heat and rinse thoroughly. Use the kure intense repair mask as a weekly intensive treatment in place of the kure repair conditioner.

description: This creamy, nourishing shampoo is designed to cleanse and care for dry, stressed or colour-treated hair. Free from potentially dulling sodium chloride, this gentle formula helps to maintain the vibrancy of your colour (whether natural or less-so), and contains silicone micro-emulsions which illuminate your hair's subtleties of tone. Chestnut milk conditions and replenishes while tomato extract and hydrocreatine combine to strengthen and enhance the elasticity of each hair shaft. Rice proteins then provide protection from environmental aggressors - which can compromise hair's lustre - so your mane remains vibrant and glossy. Now available in the original (250ml) and a new travel-friendly (75ml), you won't need to go without this hair hero ever again...

description: Target damaged, dry lengths and flooding them with hydration, the Color WOW and Chris Appleton Money Masque is your one-stop-shop for recreating a salon-worthy treatment at home. Ideal for all hair types (especially those craving a big old drink of moisture), this conditioning mask targets your hair cuticle to deliver nourishment right at the cortex — ensuring long-lasting hydration and that enviable red carpet-ready, glossy finish. Blue sea kale restores strength and suppleness to strands, while Mediterranean sea kelp and algae work to offer deep conditioning for dry ends. And to blanket your mane in weightless hydration there’s a ‘Hydrolysed Vegetable Protein Complex’. Silky, healthy hair, right this way…

description: Dry, damaged lengths at the top of your beauty bugbear list? Allow us to introduce you to the No. 9 Bond Protector Nourishing Hair Serum, a protective treatment that repairs your mane while protecting it from free radicals, pollutionandheat damage. Phew! As with all of OLAPLEX's hair heroes, the star ingredient in this weightless, silicone-free serum is bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate. Slotting into your routine as the first leave-in treatment on clean tresses,this serum protects from future damage too, as it's packed with antioxidants to neutralise free radicals, act as a shield against pollution, guard your hair from breakage and protect against heat styling. Yep, this multitasking serum mostdefinitelydeserves a place in our hair care line up...

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo 198ml Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo 198ml
description: Designed to rival your go-to rinse-out shampoo, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo not only keeps hair clean between washes, but it even cares for it too. No really, the shine and softness are unreal... It's made with fast-absorbing powders to soak up oil and sweat, which the brand's advanced powder removal system then easily eliminates for a fresh start. A helping of conditioning agents then adds softness, shine and manageability in between washes, while the refreshing spray neutralises odours and balances the scalp's sebum levels to keep your hair clean for longer. The cherry on top of the length-loving formula? It leaves no visible or textured residue so it won't look like you've dunked flour over your head! Stock up on the full size (198ml) to add to your at-home hair care collection, or throw the travel size (92ml) in your handbag for an on-the-go refresh.
how_to_use: Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results. Hold can 6-10” away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply the product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more as needed, shake can again. Style as desired. Perfect hair Day™ Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo can be used on most hair types. For thicker, coarser hair, section more thoroughly upon application. For curly hair, remove powders with a blow dryer on low and directed at the roots where the product was applied (vs. fingers or brush, which will deconstruct the curl).

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo 198ml Living Proof Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo 198ml
description: Powered by Living Proof's Triple-Action Cleaning Technology to address how hair looks, feels and smells, the brand's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo boasts a fast-absorbing powder that soaks up oil and sweat while the patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA) also helps you remove the powders easily from hair, resulting in truly clean hair. You won't regret investing in this miracle worker that also feature odour neutralisers ad time-released fragrance that keeps hair smelling clean throughout the day - no-one need know how long ago you last washed your tresses.
how_to_use: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold canister about 6-10" away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired. Tip: See a little white residue? No worries, that's the cleaning in action as the oil and sweat are absorbed by the dry shampoo. Just wait 30 seconds and brush gently to remove. Although most people don't need to, you can use a hair dryer to remove extra powder from your hair.

Available in a sized-to-try bottle (13ml) as well as the original (45ml), now's the time to discover this silken strand saviour.

After washing, No.6 Bond Smoother allows for a faster blow-dry or more defined air-dry, and No.7 Bonding Oil maximises shine, softness, and color vibrancy.

Alongside this, Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) defends hair from oxidative stress, damage and the colour-fading effect of the elements. It’s carefully crafted to support the styling routines of wavy, curly and spiralled strands with an undetectable (bar its show-stopping glossy finish) veil that revives limp and non-defined manes.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Clean 2-in-1 Scalp Scrub & Clarifying Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Clean 2-in-1 Scalp Scrub & Clarifying Shampoo

It’s infused with vital, natural nutrients – coconut oil, for one – that are activated by heat to smooth your hair and improve its sleekness. Putting an end to stress during your styling sessions, it has an intensely hydrating effect that does a world of good to the manageability of your mane. The results? Glossy and smooth hair.

name: Oribe Maximista Spray 200ml Oribe Maximista Spray 200ml
description: Delivered in an opulent ruby bottle, Oribe’s Maximista Thickening Spray lets your locks live life to the fullest, instantly imparting body and lift for thicker, fuller hair. Perfect if you’re partial to a little heat styling, the spray also offers thermal protection to minimise dryness and breakage – simply spritz it into damp hair and you’re good to go. As if that wasn’t good enough already, the opulent ruby bottle makes a great addition to any hair care collection.

name: Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 250ml Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 250ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by discerning celebrities and beauty buffs all over the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.

name: OUAI Fine Hair Shampoo 300ml OUAI Fine Hair Shampoo 300ml
description: Bottling their beloved hair-plumping shampoo in a design more than to fit to grace your bathroom shelfie, look to the Fine Hair Shampoo to bring bounce and brilliant shine into your strands’ future. If your hair feels eternally flat and seems impervious to movement, it can be a nightmare to style. That’s where this volumising shampoo steps in. The silky formula is infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin plus biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a delicate scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: BLEACH LONDON Total Bleach Kit BLEACH LONDON Total Bleach Kit
description: Bottling BLEACH London’s colour expertise so you can access it from the comfort of home, this Total Bleach Kit contains salon-standard bleach to lighten hair up to seven levels for gorgeous, platinum blonde shades. To help you achieve your lightest, brightest blonde – whether you’re a bleach-a-holic or just need a root touch-up – this kit contains a bottle of developing lotion (peroxide), two sachets of bleaching powder and a nourishing conditioning repair mask. Alongside this, there’s a pair of gloves (to keep your hands bleach-free) and an instruction leaflet to guide you through the mane-changing process. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This kit lightens hair up to 7 levels and contains BLEACH London REINCARNATION MASK for optimum hair health and is suitable for roots up to 2.5cm long. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. Not suitable for hair that is very dark, has been dyed with henna, metallic dyes or colour restorers. Best results will be seen on mid-coloured untreated hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have a second pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.

name: Olaplex No.0 Intensive Bond Builder 155ml Olaplex No.0 Intensive Bond Builder 155ml
description: You may want to cancel that salon appointment after all... Celebrating strength with a scientifically proven formula powered by a patented bond building technology known to reverse the effects of hair damage, this at-home salon-like experience repairs broken shafts and boosts hydration.

name: Olaplex Volumising Blow Dry Mist 150ml Olaplex Volumising Blow Dry Mist 150ml
description: Elevate your styling routine with Olaplex’s Volumizing Blow Dry Mist. This multi-tasking formula not only protects your hair, but it also repairs strands to create irresistibly soft results with enviable body and bounce. Case in point: this reparative mist is the ultimate protection against heat styling so you can perfect your blowout skills without worrying about damaging effects. What’s more, it helps to speed up your blow dry time, while also boosting volume — so you’re left with luscious, bouncy tresses with zero stickiness and endless shine.

name: Kitsch Satin Wrapped Flexi Rods - Rosewood Kitsch Satin Wrapped Flexi Rods - Rosewood
description: If you’ve been wanting to jump on the heatless curls bandwagon, but can’t seem to achieve the results all over your ‘For You’ feed, then this is the hair-saving hack you need in your life. Create effortless curls or waves with this dusky-hued six-piece set of flexible satin hair rollers. The perfect alternative to heat styling, and the ultimate summer hair hack (whoever can bear to heat style their hair in 30-degree weather is a beauty hero). These flexible rods are suitable for most hair types and textures and help you create classic curls without a curling wand. Made of 100% vegan satin to prevent broken strands and friction, these glide through your hair with no painful tugging and stay firmly in place while your hair dries. You might never look back after getting the hang of heatless curls!
how_to_use: With slightly damp hair, take a section of hair & start rolling up from the end upwards toward the scalp. Tuck hair securely so that the ends of your hair do not stick out. Roll upwards until taught against scalp & then bend the ends of the roller to secure it in place. Continue this process with the next roller until all rollers are in place & secure. Wear overnight or allow hair to fully dry. Remove & style to enjoy beautiful heatless curls.
ingredient: 100% vegan satin.

description: A travel-sized update of the Scalp & Body Scrub, fly-a-ouai to St. Barts with this limited edition scented version that has notes of dragonfruit, orange blossom, tuberose and baltic amber. description: Brush your way to healthier hair (and scalp) with the LED Hair Brush from New York beauty tech innovators, Solaris Laboratories. Combining LED light therapy with gentle vibrations, this clever brush fast-tracks you to your hair growth goals. Used like any other hair brush, the silicone bristles expose the scalp to both red and blue LED light therapy. These wavelengths are known to help stimulate growth, slow hair loss, promote thicker locks, soothe irritated scalps and increase the size of hair follicles for stronger strands. A relaxing massage (courtesy of 6000 gentle vibrations per minute) seals the deal for shiny, swishably healthy hair, aiding the absorption of hair care products and boosting blood flow to nourish every follicle.
how_to_use: Use on dry hair only. Alternate between the different modes during each use:  Gentle vibratory massage on the scalp for 1 minute. Using the red LED mode, massage and brush your hair for a few minutes. In blue LED mode, comb the lengths of your hair for a few minutes.

name: Color Wow Dream Filter 50ml Travel Color Wow Dream Filter 50ml Travel
description: Working overtime to keep your colour fresh and bright, this innovative pre-shampoo treatment helps to lift the dulling particles that compromise your colour to reveal a vibrant finish. The perfect way to mane-tain the integrity of your colour or highlights, it’s made with one-of-a-kind, breakthrough technology (two molecular filters with two polymeric filters) to gently and effectively remove minerals and metals from your hair. Anything from calcium and magnesium to copper, iron and chlorine can be deposited along your lengths - due to everything from the environment to the water you wash your locks with; they accumulate on your hair and can discolour your precious tresses. No more! This non-stripping spray revives vibrancy in no time at all - and comes in a sized-to-try bottle to trigger addiction before you (inevitably) commit.
how_to_use: Apply Dream Filter to dry hair before shampooing. Spray evenly to saturate hair thoroughly. Wait 1-3 minutes, then shampoo. Suggested use is every 3-4 shampoos to keep your colour looking fresh and bright. But, with frequent exposure to well water or chlorine, you can use it more often (even daily) because, unlike chelating products, DREAM FILTER is extremely gentle.

description: Designed to rival your go-to rinse-out shampoo, Living Proof's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo not only keeps hair clean between washes, but it even cares for it too. A helping of conditioning agents then adds softness, shine and manageability in between washes, while the refreshing spray neutralises odours and balances the scalp's sebum levels to keep your hair clean for longer. name: The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml The Ordinary Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair 240ml
description: With a 'gentle-is-essential' formula, the Sulphate 4% Cleanser for Body and Hair is an effective cleanser that rids your hair, skin and scalp of excess sebum, dirt, debris and product residue - without leaving skin feeling stripped, dry or irritated. With a lightly foaming formula, this multipurpose product uses a modified sulphate derivative called SLES-2, at a minimal concentration of just 4%. This modified sulphate is an effective cleansing agent - its a surfactant, which dissolves the barrier between dirt and oil on your skin, scalp and hair, allowing this to be rinsed away easily with water - but doesn't feature the irritating, sensitising or drying attributes we often associate with traditional sulphates. Instead, it helps to maintain the skin barrier - both on your body and your scalp - to keep it hydrated and healthy. In fact, this cleanser can even safely be used to a colour-treated mane without stripping it.

name: Oribe Purse Dry Texturising Spray 75ml Oribe Purse Dry Texturising Spray 75ml
description: When it comes to hair, bigger is always better – and Oribe’s Dry Texturizing Spray is the perfect shortcut to enviable volume and sexy, sultry texture. With patented polymers that absorb oil at the roots, this is a great alternative to dry shampoo, that will leave your locks looking ‘just-styled’ without a hint of powdery white residue. Kiwi and passion flower extracts deliver powerful antioxidants to maintain moisture and protect colour, while Hawaiian white ginger root extract softens and adds shine and mango extract hydrates and smooths. For that effortlessly texturised, ‘piecey’ look, a unique co-polymer blend provides subtle hold, allowing styles to last longer. An ideal addition to any hair care collection – and something of a ‘gateway’ spray likely to get you hooked on Oribe – this black and gold bottle is a sure-fire symbol of chic.
how_to_use: Shake. Spray. Pump. Finishes and holds styles. Add heat for extra volume

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo Jumbo 355ml Living Proof Perfect Hair Day Dry Shampoo Jumbo 355ml
description: Powered by Living Proof's Triple-Action Cleaning Technology to address how hair looks, feels and smells, the brand's Perfect Hair Day (PhD) Dry Shampoo boasts a fast-absorbing powder that soaks up oil and sweat while the patented 'Healthy Hair Molecule' (OFPMA) also helps you remove the powders easily from hair, resulting in truly clean hair. You won't regret investing in this miracle worker that also feature odour neutralisers ad time-released fragrance that keeps hair smelling clean throughout the day - no-one need know how long ago you last washed your tresses.
how_to_use: SHAKE CAN EXTREMELY WELL FOR MAXIMUM CLEANING RESULTS. Hold canister about 6-10" away from dry hair. Section thoroughly and apply product in a sweeping motion to dirty/oily areas. Wait 30 seconds for the powders to activate and cleanse. Then remove by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more if needed, make sure to shake again. Style as desired. Tip: See a little white residue? No worries, that's the cleaning in action as the oil and sweat are absorbed by the dry shampoo. Just wait 30 seconds and brush gently to remove. Although most people don't need to, you can use a hair dryer to remove extra powder from your hair.
ingredient: Isobutane, Propane, Alcohol Denat, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Starch, Cellulose, Octafluoropentyl Methacrylate (OFPMA), Caprylyl Glycol, Dipropylene Glycol, Citronellyl Methylcrotonate, Hydroxypropylcellulose, Hydrated Silica, Cetrimonium Chloride, Zeolite, Ethylcellulose, Octoxynol-10, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Water/Eau/Aqua, Fragrance/Parfum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenethyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Coumarin

name: The Nue Co. Supa Thick Sulfate Free Shampoo for Hair Growth 250ml The Nue Co. Supa Thick Sulfate Free Shampoo for Hair Growth 250ml
description: The key to super thick hair just got super easy! Cue: The Nue Co. Supa_Thick shampoo. This lightweight formula supports, strengthens, and shields your strands from breakages while enhancing scalp health and hair density. Giving you salon-worthy hair from the comfort of your own home, this all-nourishing shed-no-more solution resurrects lifeless locks from root to tip, encouraging hair growth. With a low pH level, the paraben free formula retains your mane’s moisture without weighing down strands. And if that wasn’t enough, the combination of red seaweed extract and oat milk replenishes your natural nutrients while soothing your scalp on a day-to-day.
how_to_use: Apply to damp hair and work through roots to tip. Rinse thoroughly. For best results use before Supa_Thick Conditioner.

name: KEVIN.MURPHY Plumping Wash Shampoo 250ml KEVIN.MURPHY Plumping Wash Shampoo 250ml
description: Like skin care for your hair, Kevin Murphy’s professional-standard range utilises the finest ingredients to deliver strength and health to your strands, ensuring that they look their very best. The mane attraction of anyone with thin tresses and a respectable knowledge of trichology, this Plumping.Wash is designed to dramatically thicken and strengthen your hair without weighing it down. Delivering on softness and shine as well as volume, here are the hero ingredients that will have you on your merry way to fuller-looking locks: extracts of ginger root and nettle help to fortify and add density to fine hair; aloe vera leaf extract lends lustre and shine; rice protein and rice amino acids help to repair, strengthen and expand the diameter of the hair shaft to give a thicker finish; mineral-rich bamboo extract fosters hair health and silk amino acids draw in moisture to reveal more flexible, bouncy strands.
how_to_use: WASH. RINSE. REPEAT. Apply to wet hair and massage gently through the hair and scalp. Rinse with PLUMPING.RINSE. Can be used daily, and as part of their THICKENING regimen.

name: Living Proof Perfect Hair Day PhD Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo Jumbo 355ml Living Proof Perfect Hair Day PhD Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo Jumbo 355ml
description: Formulated to rival your rinse-out shampoo and extend time in between washes, Living Proof’s PhD Advanced Clean Dry Shampoo Jumbo keeps hair feeling refreshed, while conditioning for a just-washed softness and shine. Fast-absorbing powders soak up oil and sweat, which the brand’s powder removal system easily eliminates – with no visible residue left behind. Alongside odour neutralisers and a sebum balancer for long-lasting freshness and cleanliness, conditioning agents enhance hair’s silkiness, shine and manageability. Stock up with the jumbo or full-sized edition, or throw the travel size in your bag for an on-the-go root refresh.
how_to_use: Shake can extremely well for maximum cleaning results. Hold can 6-10” away from dry, dirty hair. Section and apply product in a sweeping motion. Wait 30 seconds. Remove powder by massaging and shaking at roots with fingers or brush hair. Apply more as needed, shake can again. Style as desired.

name: OUAI Fur Bébé Pet Shampoo 474ml OUAI Fur Bébé Pet Shampoo 474ml
description: The only cleanser that’s deserving of your beloved fur bébé’s coat, Ouai’s Pet Shampoo is specially formulated for pampered pets – lifting dirt and intensely hydrating from snoot through to tail. Enriched with nourishing ingredients that won’t aggravate itchy or sensitive skin, this formula uses rambutan seed extract, vegetable protein and panthenol to soften fur and deliver a Crufts-worthy shine. Cue: instant waggy tails, satisfied purrs and very, very happy humans, because this shampoo is infused with the brand's delicious (and unbelievably long-lasting) 'Mercer Street' scent too. A far cry from whatever your pet rolled around in the other week, (OI – COME BACK HERE!) this formula is bursting with Italian lemon, iris, white musk, lily, jasmine sambac and Turkish Rose for infinitely sweet snuggles and no wrinkled noses. Formulated without any gluten, parabens, phthalates, SLS or SLES, this cruelty-free shampoo will have your pet begging for bath time (well, we can dream), and you can kiss goodbye to dirty paws on your freshly-mopped floor. You’re welcome.
how_to_use: Brush your fur bébé before shampooing. Wet coat thoroughly. Massage liberally from back of ears to tail. Be careful to avoid eyes. Rinse well and towel dry.

name: Davines NOUNOU Nourishing Repair Mask Davines NOUNOU Nourishing Repair Mask
description: Dry hair needs instant hydration and nourishment to keep it looking and feeling healthy, otherwise, it becomes brittle, discoloured and breaks. Davines' NOUNOU Nourishing Repair Maskis here to help... This decadent mask is made with olive butter to soften and moisturise; jojoba oil is infused to make it shiny and to counteract static and flyaways; cherry oil and rhizobian gum add natural body and an intense moisturising action. That's not all, it's even packed with natural antioxidants that possess protective properties so that it revives dry locks, leaving them instantly shiny, soft and restored. Now available in the original (250ml) and a new travel-friendly (75ml) tub, you don't need to go without this hair hero ever again...

name: WetBrush Pro Detangler - Black WetBrush Pro Detangler - Black
description: An innovation in hair care, the Pro Detangler has totally transformed our locks (and lives)! Detangling in mere minutes, this (let’s be honest, fairly ordinary looking) brush is the secret to happy hair, healthy scalp, and no more mornings spent wrestling (crying) over that nape-of-the-neck dread that’s developed… Lightweight and easy to wield, the Pro Detangler seamlessly separates all knots and tats without compromising precious strands. This is all due to the revolutionary ‘Intelliflex’ technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains – yielding or unbending as required – to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth.
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures.

name: Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Hair Mask 59ml Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Hair Mask 59ml
description: Getting to work in mere minutes, Briogeo’s Don’t Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Mask restores essential hydration and natural vibrancy to dry, brittle, over-processed and lacklustre locks. Like a moisturising drink for thirsty manes, it’s formulated with Briogeo’s unique NOVA Complex, which contains an optimal blend of transformative nutrients from B-vitamins, rosehip and argan oils, algae and biotin to replenish damaged hair and leave it shiny, glossy and healthy-looking. It’s safe for colour-, keratin- and chemically-treated hair and is sure to be the highlight of your head’s week.
how_to_use: After shampooing, massage into the hair, ensuring the conditioner is evenly applied. Leave in for five to 10 minutes before rinsing. For even deeper conditioning, cover the hair in a plastic cap to retain moisture while sitting under the dryer for 30 minutes, then rinse. It should be used once per week or every two weeks. In between treatments, it is recommended to use one of Briogeo's shampoo and conditioner sets (sold separately). Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Brassica Alcohol*, Cetyl Alcohol*, Propanediol*, Stearyl Alcohol*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil*, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil*, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Panthenol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate*, Biotin, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein*, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein*, Panax Ginseng Root Extract*, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract*, Laurus Nobilis Leaf Extract*, Palmaria Palmata Extract*, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride*, Cetyl Esters*, Isododecane, Cetrimonium Chloride*, Cetearyl Alcohol*, Behentrimonium Methosulfate*, Brassicyl Isoleucinate Esylate*, Citric Acid*, Isopropyl Myristate*, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin*, Fragrance (Parfum), Dehydroacetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol

name: Caudalie Smooth & Glow Oil Elixir 100ml Caudalie Smooth & Glow Oil Elixir 100ml
description: Just as its name suggests, this non-greasy dry oil gives the ultimate smoothing and glow-giving finish to your body, tresses and décolleté. Infused with antioxidants and precious oils, including Caudalie's signature grape seed alongside nourishing argan, sesame and almond – this power-packed blend works collectively to soften and smooth your skin and hair. Prickly pear is key for its anti-inflammatory properties, and it also promotes hair growth (luscious locks, incoming). Don't forget to breathe in when you apply it, the natural fig scent delivers the most sensual fragrance – making you look, feel and smell good with every use.
how_to_use: Apply onto dry skin and hair.

name: JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops 50ml JVN Complete Nourishing Shine Drops 50ml
description: The perfect finishing touch to your styling routine, these non-greasy Nourishing Shine Drops smooth the way for shinier, healthier, swishier hair. Simply smooth through your finished style for instant lustre and subtle scent - accompanying Jonathan Van Ness-style mirror affirmations, optional. Suitable for all hair types and textures (even fine hair), this replenishing oil is infused with JVN's patented hemi-squalane and squalane to boost hair health and restore 'slip' - without the drying effects of silicones. Meadowfoam ester and hibiscus extracts lock in moisture while granting instant glossiness and protection against damage and colour fade. With notes of sweet honey, florals, grapefruit and tangerine, these multitasking drops leave hair with a heavenly scent and shine.
how_to_use: Dispense into your palms and rub together before smoothing through mid lengths and ends, gently running whatever is remaining lightly over your root if you have flyaways to tame. Apply more for thicker, longer hair.

name: BLEACH LONDON Reincarnation Mask 500ml BLEACH LONDON Reincarnation Mask 500ml
description: Don’t let colour kill your hair – resurrect strands and remain the best tressed with BLEACH London’s Reincarnation Mask. Magnificently moisturising, this intensive treatment is enriched with sunflower seed extract and micro wheat proteins to hydrate hair and boost elasticity, while also imparting enviable shine, strength and colour vibrancy. For a total treat, enhance the ultra-conditioning effect by wrapping hair in a warm towel and leaving this on for 10-20 minutes. The formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan (like the entire BLEACH line, in fact) so you can comfort scalp, strands and conscience at once. Sublime.
how_to_use: Apply to shampooed hair, comb through and massage in. To enhance the super conditioning effect, wrap your hair in a warm towel. Leave on hair for 10-20 minutes. Rinse well. Use whenever your hair feels parched.

name: ghd Mini Bodyguard Heat Protect Spray 50ml ghd Mini Bodyguard Heat Protect Spray 50ml
description: Always use protection! As much as we love our precious styling tools, there's no denying that the high temperatures can cause damage to our tresses. That's where ghd's Bodyguard - Heat Protect Spray comes in. Now available in the original (120ml) bottle and a sized-to-try (50ml) vial, there's no excuse for going without this tress-protecting hero! Enriched with ghd's 'Heat Protection System', it contains protection polymers that invisibly shield your precious locks from potential heat damage. Lightweight and non-sticky, the formula can be layered with other styling products or used alone prior to heat styling for a salon-worthy finish you'll fall mane over heels for.
how_to_use: Spritz over damp or dry hair from roots to tips - around 6-8 sprays for mid-to-long hair. Comb through the product to ensure it's evenly distributed. Heat style as normal. If you're layering this with other products, apply it first.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 80ml Hair By Sam McKnight Happy Endings Nourishing Balm 80ml
description: A styler with serious benefits, this defining, de-fluffing and de-frizzing balm deeply conditions every strand it touches — think of this as hair care and a styler in one pretty-in-pink bottle. Best friend to the lazy beauty maven, the Happy Endings Nourishing Balm combines hair care with the styling prowess that Sam McKnight is famed for. In need of a primer to use ahead of styling? This multi-tasking balm perfectly preps your hair and makes light works of styling your ‘do. Is second-day frizz ruining your look? Just a pump or two of this conditioning cream tames flyaways and smooths as you work it through to leave you with perfectly tamed tresses. If your carefully styled curls are lacking definition, fear not, as this powerhouse product adds definition to your waves and curls to keep them perfectly coiffed. Even better? Thanks to ‘Vegabead Microcapsules’ that boost manageability and shine (without adding build-up either), you can re-style and smooth your hair as the day goes on — these shine-boosting microcapsules reactivate whenever you comb or brush your strands… we’re just as impressed as you are!.
how_to_use: Apply to wet or dry hair, massage 2-3 pumps evenly over the palms of your hands, work into the ends and up through the mid lengths of your hair.

name: BLEACH LONDON White Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON White Toner Kit
description: Whatever the shade, the ultimate blonde ambition is to banish brassiness for good – and BLEACH London’s White Toner Kit is one of the best ways we’ve ever found. Neutralising yellow, orangey pigments, this semi-permanent (it lasts around 16-20 washes) post-bleach toner kit keeps hair at its brightest blonde, whether you’re golden, white, silver or platinum. Containing a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a repairing treatment mask (to nourish stressed-out strands), alongside a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet, this really does contain everything you need to carry off effortless application. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This semi-permanent dye will last for around 16-20 washes. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. The final effect will depend on your hair colour. Best results will be seen on already very pale yellow bleached or highlighted hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH London TOTAL BLEACH or BLEACH London DIY DIP DYE to lighten your hair first. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Follow with BLEACH London SILVER SHAMPOO every other wash to extend brightness.
