name: BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON White Heat Super Colour Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: The INKEY List Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment 150ml The INKEY List Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment 150ml
description: If you find that you’re moulting more than usual, or feel like your hair is increasingly thin, THE INKEY LIST’s Caffeine Stimulating Scalp Treatment was made with you in mind. Clinically proven to reduce and prevent hair loss (after three months of testing, 85% of testers showed significant improvement), this overnight treatment invigorates stem cells to optimise growth and increase your hair’s thickness. With 1% caffeine powder – a stimulant that kick-starts sluggish follicles – alongside 1% Redensyl (which both supplements growth and helps counteract fallout) and 1% Betaine to soften and nourish each strand, this helps to build body for lustrous locks.
how_to_use: We recommend shaking the bottle before use. Use as an overnight treatment. Shake into the palm of your hand, massage hands together, use your fingertips to rub into scalp and leave on overnight. Apply enough to cover entire scalp. Wash hair as normal in the morning, if desired. Use every night for best results over a 3 month period.
ingredient: 1% Caffeine Powder – helps to stimulate scalp and hair follicles 1% Redensyl™ – helps to improve hair growth while reducing hair loss 1% Betaine – helps to condition hair, leaving it soft and silky Water (Aqua\Eau), Betaine, Caffeine, Panthenol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Lactic Acid, Sodium Metabisulfite, Glycine, Larix Europaea Wood Extract, Camellia Sinensis (Tea) Extract, Zinc Chloride. *Packaging may vary.

name: Davines Energizing Shampoo Davines Energizing Shampoo
description: Do you want to stop thinning hair in its tracks? Then you need to meet Davines’ Energizing Shampoo, formulated with caffeine phytoceuticals, this hard-working formula stimulates circulation and improves elasticity, preventing further or future hair loss with continued use. Benefitting from eucalyptus and peppermint oil extracts as well as niacinamide and citric acid, this hard-working shampoo works to cleanse, clear and calm irritated and congested scalps. Housed in a minimalist deep brown bottle with quintessential Davines packaging, this Energizing Shampoo will look right at home in your bathroom while delivering effective use with continuous use.
how_to_use: Gently massage into damp hair and allow to process for a few minutes. Rinse thoroughly, and follow with Energizing treatments.

name: OUAI Curl Crème 236ml OUAI Curl Crème 236ml
description: To craft their Curl Crème - Fragranced, the minds behind OUAI Haircare turned to the most knowledgable, discerning people they know: their very own curly-haired community. That's right, this luscious blend was co-created with 150 members of their community and faced over a year of testing before they were sure it was worthy of touching your curls... This does-it-all styling cream is brimming with conditioning plant oils that add definition, shine and impressive hydration to parched coils, curls and ringlets. It's unique consistency first goes on like a cream before melting into your hair with the swiftness of an oil; speaking of which, at the heart of the formula is a frizz-smoothing duo of chia and linseed oils that emphasise the shape of your curls as well as protecting them against humidity. Coconut oil then floods your hair with hydration and helps to seal damaged cuticles, while babassu oil softens and enhances shine. The finishing touch is an infusion of the brand's fan-favourite North Bondi scent: a bergamot and lemon blend that's simply bewitching. As for what's not included, this vegan cream is free from silicones, SLS, parabens, phthalates and gluten. Psst, the tube is also made out of sugarcane plastic, making it 100% recyclable!
how_to_use: On wet hair: To prevent breakage, section and detangle your hair using a wide-tooth comb (stay away from bristle brushes because they can disrupt your curl pattern) Start with a dime-size amount of Curl Crème and evenly distribute it with your fingers (it’s super creamy and melts into your curls like an oil) Comb through each section using your fingers to ensure Curl Crème blesses each and every curve Let your hair dry, then say hello to your softest curls ever If you plan on heat styling later and want heat protection, pair Curl Crème with OUAI Leave In Conditioner, our multitasking detangler and leave-in that provides thermal heat protection and weightless hydration On dry hair: A little bit of Curl Crème goes a long OUAI in refreshing day-two or day-three curls. On dry hair, apply Curl Crème sparingly and directly to your curls to help define and smooth frizz and flyaways.
ingredient: Water / Aqua / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Orbignya Speciosa Kernel Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Hydrogenated Soybean Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Extract, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Cetrimonium Chloride (Anti-Static Agent / Agent Antistatique), Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Lauryl Glucoside, Polyquaternium-37, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol,Isopropyl Alcohol, Xylitol,Caprylic Acid, Sorbitan Oleate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Fragrance / Parfum, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Deep-Conditioning Treatment 75ml
description: An iconic hair hero given an irresistibly tropical twist, Philip Kingsley’s Coconut Breeze Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Infused with exotic scent, this Coconut Breeze incarnation captures the scent of sunshine and pure white sands, taking your head on a holiday with warm notes of coconut, jasmine, almond and vanilla. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A treat for the senses as well as tresses, this will leave your locks smelling divine, as well as looking and feeling intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive!
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Amodimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum (Fragrance), Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hydrolyzed Elastin, Trideceth-12, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Coumarin, Citral

name: ghd Gold Hair Straightener ghd Gold Hair Straightener
description: As good as gold, this ghd gold® styler is a must-have for sleek, smooth and shiny hair – no matter if you like it straight, curly or wavy. Heating up faster than you can say 'I'm in love with my ghd's' (or thereabouts), this incredible tool takes only 25 seconds to be ready for use, making them a godsend for busy bees, rushed mornings and 'I should have arrived at the party half an hour ago' occasions. After extensive research, ghd's scientists concluded that 185ºC is the ideal temperature for styling; cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. To ensure this optimum temperature is always maintained, the plates have been carefully crafted with dual-zone technology – instead of one, they have two heat sensors across each plate that regulate heat from root to tip. These clever floating plates are also ultra-smooth, gliding effortlessly through your tresses to create a frizz-free style with salon-rivalling shine. Great for straightening, curling or creating beachy waves, the tool has a round barrel to deliver snag-free, versatile styles with ease. For peace of mind, the device automatically switches off after 30 minutes and has a heat-resistant protective plate guard so you can take it out and about without risk of burns. With so much to offer, the golden ticket to your best hair yet is well deserved of a spot in your next Cult Beauty haul...
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W. Packaging may vary.

name: Briogeo Farewell Frizz Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Cream Briogeo Farewell Frizz Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Cream
description: A must-have blow-dry booster, Briogeo’s Rosarco Blow Dry Perfection & Heat Protectant Crème is a weightless finishing and heat protectant cream with added moisturising benefits. Perfect for dry, damaged, chemically-treated and heat-styled hair, this silicone-free formula is infused with a nourishing blend of rosehip, argan and coconut oils to smooth hair, enhance shine and tame frizz. Granting hitherto unattainable blow-dry results, the crafty cream also provides thermal protection up to 425°F – so you can straighten, curl and style to your heart’s content.
how_to_use: Apply one to two quarter-sized amounts to freshly washed, damp hair, evenly from root to tip then blow dry and style as desired. Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

name: Davines More Inside This Is A Dry Texturizer 250ml Davines More Inside This Is A Dry Texturizer 250ml
description: The latest addition to Davines cult collection, the Dry Texturizer Spray provides defined texture and hold for a chic, freshly cut and styled appearance. A must-have for ultra-chic and beautifully styled hair, Davines' Dry Texturizer Spray provides piecey, defined texture and hold within seconds of application. The formula is also paraben and colourant-free and also remains completely workable so hair will be free from any unwanted crunch. Perfect for creating enhanced volume, definition and style, this chic product gives hair an instant full-bodied and tousled look without weighing it down. What more could you want?
how_to_use: Shake well. Apply to dry hair from approximately 10 inches away. Spray Dry Texturizer on both roots and lengths, lifting and gently releasing hair to ensure an even application.
ingredient: Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., Vp/Va Copolymer, Aqua, Parfum, Zeolite, Cyclopentasiloxane, Cyclohexasiloxane

name: Philip Kingsley Body Building Shampoo (250ml) Philip Kingsley Body Building Shampoo (250ml)
description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently cleansing, Philip Kingsleys Body Building Shampoo boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. Ideal for flat hair thats prone to getting oily quickly, the formula plumps each and every strand for thicker, fuller looking hair. Its enriched with natural cellulose to achieve this plumping, as well as keratin proteins to help strengthen hair and improve its overall volume. Meanwhile, copolymers control flyaway and static and the gentle cleansing action removes excess build-up and product residue. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, the Body Building Shampoo makes fine hair healthier and more manageable.And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner

name: Coco & Eve Super Hydration Kit (£45.80) Coco & Eve Super Hydration Kit (£45.80)
description: Cleanse, condition and treat your mane with the Super Hydration Kit, an irresistibly scented set (get ready to fall in love with Coco & Eve's signature 'Coconut & Fig' fragrance) that promises smooth, shiny and healthy hair. Inside this crowd pleasing duoyou'll find: the Super Hydrating Shampoo, which uses hyaluronic acid to intensely hydrate for a smooth and soft finish, while pineapple fruit enzymes slough away the dirt, dry skin and excess product build-up atop your scalp; the Super Hydrating Conditioner, which uses nourishing avocado to pump strands with proteins and vitamins and coconut to feed lengths with fatty acids that seal split ends.
how_to_use: Shampoo: Apply a small amount to damp hair & scalp. Use a shampoo brush for a relaxing scalp massage and to release the lather. Rinse thoroughly then follow with Conditioner. Conditioner: On clean, damp hair work a small amount on the lengths & ends. Leave for up to 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

name: Kitsch Eco-Friendly Jumbo Open Shape Claw Clip (Various Colours) Kitsch Eco-Friendly Jumbo Open Shape Claw Clip (Various Colours)
description: The secret to minimalist styling with just a *touch* of quirkiness, the Eco-Friendly Jumbo Claw Clip is about to become the chicest new addition to your hair accessory wardrobe. What’s so great about a claw clip that made them a staple in every nineties up-do? Well, they can be used to style and hold even the thicket of manes (they work brilliantly in curly or coily hair too!), the stylish designs that are both classic and statement at the same time are made from recycled materials — yay! After all, who doesn’t love a more sustainable option when it comes to our hair care? Oh, and did we mention how much less damaging a claw clip can be to your mane compared to your usual scrunchie or hair tie? Hair breakage? We don’t know her.
how_to_use: Keep the clip dry to avoid damage.
ingredient: Recycled materials.

name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Anti-Frizz Hair Oil 58ml
description: Ultra-hydrating and divinely scented, Sol de Janeiro’s Brazilian Glossy Nourishing Hair Oil promotes mirror-like shine and impressively sleek strands. It’s infused with a nourishing cocktail of Brazilian oils (read: patauá, buriti and pequi) which are brimming with antioxidants, fatty acids and essential vitamins that deeply moisturise, smooth and enhance the lustre of your lengths. This luscious oil is also laced with the brand’s iconic Cheirosa ’62 scent that’s sure to transport you to the sun-soaked beaches of Rio as work it into your strands. It’s credentials are pretty stellar too; in a clinical study conducted by an independent third party lab, the oil (when used as directed) was clinically proven to repair split ends and provide 72-hour frizz control and up to 450° heat protection.
how_to_use: For Wet/Damp Hair: Use this oil treatment as a before air drying or heat styling to tame frizz — or as a heat protectant for up to 450 degrees. Ideal for dry, damaged hair. For Dry Hair: Rub a small amount of oil in between your palms, and start with your ends, working your way up to mid-shaft. Benefits of application on dry hair include taming flyways, managing frizz, enhancing shine, or adding hydration in between washes.
ingredient: Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Coco-Caprylate, Parfum (Fragrance), Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuaçu) Seed Butter, Caryocar Brasiliense (Pequi) Fruit Oil, Oenocarpus Bataua (Patauá) Fruit Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dimethiconol, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Limonene, Cl 40800 (Beta-Carotene).

name: Davines OI Shampoo 90ml Davines OI Shampoo 90ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 280ml or 90ml for home and away.

Brimming with a potent blend of hydrating heroes namely hyaluronic acid, moringa seed oils, transparent henna and a proprietary bond strengthening complex — whew! — this featherlight, in-shower treatment sinks deeply into strands and repairs them from the inside out. Leaving your hair looking (and feeling) 93% stronger and up to three time shinier, consider this milk-like formula the key to the dream-sheen on your wishlist.

name: Amika Perk Up Dry Shampoo Amika Perk Up Dry Shampoo
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Tired of your lengths looking limp once you hit the second-day mark? Allow us to introduce you to the Perk Up Dry Shampoo! The closest thing to washing your hair without water, this Holy Grail spray actually helps to make your hair look (and feel!) beautifully clean. Dissatisfied with the formulas on offer, the minds behind amika set out to create a dry shampoo that ticked all of their boxes, and here it is! Invisible when used correctly, this super-fine mist is the key to a freshly washed look withoutanywhite residue, period. Plus, it's infused with rice starch to add some extra 'oomph!' to your style (no more lengths lying limp!). Never powdery, itchy or sticky, you can layer this mist for days and days to keep your style looking fresh and clean! Psst, did we mention it's safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: Shake well. Hold 8 inches away and spray onto desired area, focusing on the roots. Wait 30 seconds. Massage as you would with a wet shampoo. Brush through. Great for braids, post-workout or to reactivate day 2 or 3 styles.

(Sd Alcohol 40-B), Oryza Sativa (Rice/Riz) Starch, Fragrance/Parfum, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cyclopentasiloxane, Water/Eau/Aqua, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Extract, Phenoxyethanol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Citronellol.

description: If your hair seems to never quite feel as fresh as you'd like then it's high time you introduced Aveda's Rosemary Mint Purifying Shampoo into your tress-care sessions... The finishing touch is an invigorating aroma of certified organic rosemary, peppermint and spearmint that promises to stimulate your senses as you shower.

description: Bound to steal a spot in your weekly ritual, this ultra-restorative mask is the perfect pick-me-up for damaged, chemical-treated hair. This ultra-creamy treatment gets to nourishing work in just three-five minutes. Encouraging tousle-worthy softness with enviable lustre, the blend of plant extracts and rich oils penetrate deep into your hair follicle for visible results. Smart keratin helps to bolster the defences each strand from the cortex to the cuticle, while bamboo stem cells set out to strengthen existing strands and encourage healthy hair growth by extending the anagen phase of your hair life cycle. Working effortlessly to make your mane more manageable, argan oil conditions each strand to enhance shine and ease frustrating frizz. Prickly pear oil is the final antioxidant-rich flourish - the lightweight oil cloaks your hair in a UV-protective veil to fend off free-radical damage.

description: Bottling their beloved hair-plumping shampoo in a design more than to fit to grace your bathroom shelfie, look to the Fine Hair Shampoo to bring bounce and brilliant shine into your strands’ future. If your hair feels eternally flat and seems impervious to movement, it can be a nightmare to style. That’s where this volumising shampoo steps in. The silky formula is infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin plus biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a delicate scent even after the suds leave your strands. name: Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Shampoo (Various Sizes) Sol de Janeiro Brazilian Joia Shampoo (Various Sizes)

Encapsulated plant-based keratin beads help to repair split ends, while a rich blend of brazil nut, coconut oil, buriti fruit oil and cupuaçu butter create smoother, shinier strands. name: Oribe Gold Lust Hair Oil 100ml Oribe Gold Lust Hair Oil 100ml
description: Treat your hair to some golden goodness with Oribe's Gold Lust Nourishing Hair Oil, a luxurious yet light oil that absorbs swiftly into strands calling out for an SOS. Each protective drop of this liquid gold penetrates the hair to deeply condition, strengthen and smooth, imparting intense nourishment and incredible shine. A rich blend of emollients conditions and softens hair without weighing it down: argan oil adds lightweight shine, reduces frizz and shields strands from damaging UV rays and pollutants; jasmine oil helps to combat a dry, itchy scalp and enhance shine further; sandalwood extract, amur cork bark extract and barley extract stimulate the hair cuticle; cassis seed oil imparts moisturising omega-6 and omega-3 acids and, finally, shea butter (rich in vitamin F) moisturises and softens dryness and damage, adding lustre and helping to prevent further damage. Oribe's signature bio-restorative complex (including plant collagen, caffeine and biotin) defends hair from oxidative stress while also guarding against the deterioration of natural keratin. Providing thermal protection, detangling and reducing drying time - on top of all of the above! - there's really nothing this hair miracle can't do. Plus, the alchemist-style bottle is sure to add a touch of luxe opulence to your dressing table.
how_to_use: Apply throughout damp hair as a pre-shampoo or overnight treatment. Use on damp hair before blow drying for heat protection or apply to dry hair for extra lustre, conditioning and frizz control. Use on dry hair before going in the sun for protection.

name: Augustinus Bader The Shampoo 200ml Augustinus Bader The Shampoo 200ml
description: Inspired by over 30 years of scientific innovation, Augustinus Bader’s The Shampoo with TFC8 works into a gentle foaming lather that thoroughly cleanses and supports root-to-tip renewal, while boosting volume and shine. Fusing the TFC8 technology (a complex of natural amino acids and vitamins) with a holistic selection of complementary active ingredients, this game-changing range brings the same excellence of their skin care to the world of hair care; each formula is centred around protecting and supporting the hair’s rejuvenating abilities, as well as creating the optimal environment for strong, healthy hair and scalp. In the case of the shampoo, your hair with feel nourished and hydrated from the first use, and over time it promotes stronger, thicker hair that’s less prone to breakage and shedding. How? Watercress and Indian cress extracts support keratin production to strengthen strands from the root; maca root extract stimulates the follicles and bolsters strand resilience; vitamin B5 moisturises from root to tip, boosting manageability and shine; shikakai extract gently refreshes and detangles as it prevents scalp flakiness; finally, neem extract helps to optimise your scalp heath and encourage growth.

name: OUAI Scalp Serum 50ml OUAI Scalp Serum 50ml
description: Firmly of the belief that healthy hair starts with the scalp, Ouai has created the hydrating and rebalancing scalp serum to bring us the healthy hair that we have coveted for oh-so long. Supporting the appearance of thicker, healthier and more lustrous hair just got sensorial with this earthy and uplifting treatment. Anything that smells this good has to be Ouai, and a new fresh scent too! Has Christmas come early? Top notes of ginger and spearmint run down through tomato leaves and green fig to settle in base notes of wet grass and ambroxan for a truly indulgent self care moment as you massage this into your scalp. Cultivating the healthiest environment for your hair to flourish in are arctic root, Siberian ginseng and chaga mushroom, adaptogens that promote hydration and a healthy barrier. Have you gone a little OTT on the styling front? Fear not, red clover extract works to reduce scalp discomfort from overstimulation while peptides support the full, thick and healthy hair we have always dreamed of…we’re ready for our close-up now.
how_to_use: Apply daily for best results. This is a leave-in product, do not rinse out. Must be applied directly to the scalp. Can be applied in the am or pm on wet or dry hair. Do not apply to open wounds and/or broken skin on the scalp. Start application in your natural part and along your hairline. Press and release the bulb once to fill the glass pipette. Unscrew the cap. Use short, quick presses to release drops throughout the scalp. Massage in to help distribute and absorb into the scalp. SCALP SERUM is skin care inspired. The key is consistent use to see results and absorption. Face serums typically can take anywhere from a 1 minute to a few minutes to absorb and completely dry. Same goes for SCALP SERUM – wait until the serum has completely dried and absorbed before washing hair. If applying at night you are safe to wash your hair and scalp in the morning. If you apply in the morning you will safe to wash your hair and scalp in the afternoon or evening.

name: Oribe Supershine Moisturizing Cream 5 fl. oz. Oribe Supershine Moisturizing Cream 5 fl. oz.

Plus, with it available in a supersized 354ml, so you won't ever have to worry about being without it.

name: JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask 147ml JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask 147ml
description: Meet the ultimate weekly treatment for thirsty locks of all types and textures - even fine hair. JVN Nurture Deep Moisture Mask infuses every strand with intense moisture for lasting hydration, softness and manageability that won't weigh you down. With notes of fruity blackcurrant and smooth vanilla to make this mask a real treat to use, Nurture Deep Moisture Mask gets to work replenishing dried out tresses in as little as 3 minutes. Rice protein and camellia seed oil add shine, softness and strength, while JVN's patented (and sustainable!) sugarcane-derived hemi-squalane instantly improves hair health and restores 'slip' - without the drying effects of silicones.

description: Do you want moreee from your hair? The sky’s the limit with Volumize Hair Goal that’s designed to re-energise limp and lifeless strands with a new and improved look. Go big or go home with this amaranth seed-infused formula which not only adds an extra oomph to your tresses but also lifts away excess build up when mixed with your shampoo or conditioner. More than your average styling essential in more ways than we can count, you can curate your own hair care routine that works for you and only you. Made from 99% naturally-derived sulfate-free ingredients, say cheers to fuller, more voluminous looking locks boasting salon-worthy results.
how_to_use: Snap open your #hairgoal. Pour 1 shot into any of your Function of Beauty hair care bases. Each box contains 2 shots. Shake (or stir!) for 15 seconds!

name: BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON The Big Pink Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 75ml Christophe Robin Cleansing Purifying Scrub with Sea Salt 75ml
description: Discover this deeply cleansing shampoo that works to slough away daily build up as it cleans your locks, revealing a rebalanced and refreshed scalp and radiant lengths. For a gentle exfoliation (that won’t irritate already sensitive or inflamed skin!), this detoxing formula uses sea salt crystals (which won’t clog up your plug or cause damage to the environment like other exfoliants!). There’s a ‘Natural Carbohydrate Complex’ which helps to rebalance your scalp's natural defences by reducing the moisture barrier-compromising effects of dehydration. And you’ll also find bisabolol, extracted from the Brazilian candeia tree, which helps to calm your scalp as it cleanses away dirt, pollution and excess oil.
how_to_use: Once a week, or immediately after rinsing a chemical colourant, apply a tablespoon of product onto wet hair. Gently massage into the scalp, including the nape of the neck, and emulsify. Rinse thoroughly.

name: Davines OI Oil Davines OI Oil
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Daviness OI range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ku) a secret ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the Lipstick Tree to protect their hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensively replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and controlling weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. Available in two sizes, pick from either 135ml or 50ml for home and away.

name: Davines Oi Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 75ml Davines Oi Absolute Beautifying Conditioner 75ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by discerning celebrities and beauty buffs all over the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 150ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Extreme Rich Deep-Conditioning Treatment 150ml
description: An intensified version of an iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsley’s Elasticizer Extreme will transform your hair care ritual, even if you’re struggling with very dry, damaged hair. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects – and this edition contains higher active doses of its clever ingredients to offer even more intense benefits. Originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, the formula boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture in the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny – and all before you’ve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage – you’ll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer Extreme in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Extreme Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Ethylhexyl Dimethyl PABA, Amodimethicone, Polyquaternium-37, Diazolidinyl Urea, Silicone Quaternium-18, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Trideceth-12, Trideceth-6, Cetrimonium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Elastin, PPG-1 Trideceth-6, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Ethylhexylglycerin

description: The key to super thick hair just got super easy! Cue: The Nue Co. Supa_Thick Conditioner. This lightweight formula supports, strengthens, and shields your strands from breakages while enhancing scalp health and hair density. Giving you salon-worthy hair from the comfort of your own home, this all-nourishing shed-no-more solution resurrects lifeless locks from root to tip, encouraging hair growth. With a pH below 5.5, the paraben-free formula retains your mane’s moisture without weighing down strands. And if that wasn’t enough, the combination of red seaweed extract and oat milk replenishes your natural nutrients while soothing your scalp on a day-to-day.

description: Introducing the Scalp Solutions Balancing Shampoo, your new wash day essential set to restore out-of-whack scalps and reveal silky soft strands. name: Oribe Signature Shampoo 250ml Oribe Signature Shampoo 250ml
description: Add a little indulgence to your hair care with Oribe’s Signature Shampoo, a rich daily cleanser that offers results certain to go straight to your head. Custom-blended from the most exclusive ingredients available, this luscious formula gently cleanses, detangles and protects hair, leaving it silky without adding weight. Available in two sizes, pick from the 250ml full size or the 75ml mini to try this fan favourite on for size (or ensure you're never without your go-to while travelling. Coconut, corn and oat-derived cleansers gently cleanse without stripping, while vegetable-derived humectants impart the optimal level of shine without weighing strands down. Kaempferia galanga root extract, found in Southeast Asia, delivers natural UV protection, while amber extract delivers conditioning antioxidant protection and keratin and hydrolysed keratin strengthen damaged hair and protect the surface of the hair shaft. Alongside this, Oribe’s signature complex (including watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extracts) defends hair from oxidative stress, ageing and the deterioration of natural keratin. What’s more, the opulent midnight black bottle is certain to add a touch of luxe to your bathroom shelf.
how_to_use: Oribe says: Lather, indulge, rinse.

name: Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Hair Butter 250ml Davines OI Absolute Beautifying Hair Butter 250ml
description: Quirkily cool yet results-driven, Davines’s ‘OI’ range is powered by roucou oil (pronounced ru ‘ku) – a ‘secret’ ingredient beloved by native inhabitants of the Amazon rainforest, who rely on the fruits of the ‘Lipstick Tree’ to protect their skin and hair against the sun and other daily stresses. Intensely replenishing, Davines have harnessed the potency of this wonder-extract to create a range of shine-enhancing, moisture-boosting hair care treatments – suitable for all hair types, these exquisite products are perfect for nourishing, smoothing and ‘controlling’ weakened, dry or tempestuous tresses. By combining high-grade natural ingredients with first-rate scientific rigour, Davines’s founders the Bollati family have expanded their Parmese research laboratory into a multi-national hair care business with an inspiring range of original and authentic products, beloved by hosts of discerning celebrities and beauty buffs around the world. Available in two sizes, pick from either 250ml or 75ml for home and away.
how_to_use: Warm product onto the palm of your hand before applying. For medium to thick hair: apply product on towel-dried hair and leave in for 5-10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well. For medium to fine hair: apply on dry hair and leave in for 10 minutes. Proceed to rinse well and shampoo as usual. For an extra nourishing boost: apply both before and after shampooing as noted above.
ingredient: Aqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alchol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Glycerin Dimethicone, Cetrimonium Chloride, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Behenyl Alchol, Polyglyceryl-10 Pentastearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Quaternium-87, Parfum / Fragrance, Isopropyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojo-Ba) Seed Oil, C15-19 Alkane, Dimethiconol, Silicone Quaternium-22, Sodium Benzoate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Disodium Edta, Oryza Sativa Cera / Oryza Sativa ( Rice ) Bran Wax, Dipropylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-3 Caprate, Citric Acid, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Sorbitan Isostearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Citronellol, Geranoil, Palmitamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Propylene Glycol, Bixa Orellana Seed Oil.

name: Melanin Haircare Multi-Use Pure Oil Blend 237ml Melanin Haircare Multi-Use Pure Oil Blend 237ml
description: Rich and hydrating (yet never greasy), the Melanin Haircare Multi-Use Pure Oil Blend delivers a much-needed boost of hydration to thirsty-feeling strands. The lightweight treatment is like a drink of water for the hair. Combining vitamin E with a nourishing medley of baobab, argan, sweet almond, jojoba and sage oils, the vegan blend locks moisture into the lengths, all while removing stubborn knots. A true do-it all formula, the treatment grants irresistible softness and strengthening benefits to all hair textures. Its easy-to-use pipette applicator is a saviour for morning rushes and late-night routines.
how_to_use: A little goes a long way. As a sealant, massage into wet/damp hair to help seal the moisture into your strands. Can be used before or after your favourite styling cream. You may add it to your favourite conditioner to help detangle. Can also be used as a hot oil treatment or used as a body moisturiser after bathing.
ingredient: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Diheptyl Succinate, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea, (Vitamin E), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Adansonia Digitata Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Tocopherol, (Vitamin E), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Adansonia Digitata, (Baobab) Seed Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citrus Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil Expressed, Salvia, Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Oil, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool.

name: OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 40g OUAI Texturizing Hair Spray 40g
description: The perfect way to add some ‘grit’ to slippery hair types, OUAI’s Texturizing Hair Spray is ideal for recreating that enviable ‘French girl’ look – a tousled sexiness that exudes Parisian nonchalance. Invert your head and spray the roots to create ‘oomph’ (and absorb oil), then spray the lengths and ‘tszuj’ with fingers to achieve a separated, choppy finish. Enriched with OUAI’s ‘Smart Technology’ – a cocktail of nourishing ingredients including amino acids, tamarind seed, keratin, ama oil, hibiscus and jasmine to strengthen, enhance moisture levels, repair and protect from humidity – this refreshes, volumises and perfumes your strands with the delicate scents of Italian bergamot, rose, lily of the valley, waterlily, iris and white musk (ideal to disguise a stale, night-on-the-town odour).
how_to_use: Shake it up. Holding the bottle 6" from your head, mist dry hair from roots to ends. For ultimate volume, flip hair upside down and spray. Jen's Tip: Mist it on dry hair and scrunch strands out with your fingers for a loose, lived-in look. Flip hair upside down and spray for instantly fresh-looking hair.
ingredient: Hydrofluorocarbon 152A, Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Actinidia Chinensis (Kiwi) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Extract, Hedychium Coronarium (Ginger) Root Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Passiflora Incarnata (Passion Flower) Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Extract, Glycerin, Acetyl Triethyl Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Zeolite, Butylene Glycol, Aqua (Water, Eau), PEG/PPG-17/18 Dimethicone, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Hydroxycitronellal.

name: Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 238ml Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 238ml
description: Achieve fuller-looking hair with the Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray. Delivering volume, texture and a long-lasting finish, the styling spray helps create salon-worthy results. Dispensing texturising molecules throughout the hair, the spray instantly elevates your locks, adding dimension and voluminous shape. The improved valve enables a controlled distribution and a softer spritz, allowing you to have more precision over the product. Formulated to provide heat protection up to 210°C, the spray is compatible for use with heated styling tools.
how_to_use: For use on dry hair. Shake the bottle well before each spritz and hold 6-10 inches away from the head. Begin spraying from the root, moving through to the ends of the hair and work in with your fingers. To create even more volume, tilt your head sideways or upside down and apply for bigger results.
ingredient: Dimethyl Ether, Alcohol Denat., VP/VA Copolymer, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Water/Eau/Aqua, Cyclodextrin, Zeolite, Fragrance/Parfum, Ethylcellulose, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Linalool, Citronellol, Citral, Limonene.

name: Aesop Conditioner 500ml Aesop Conditioner 500ml
description: The key to coaxing tangles from your tresses, Aesop's lightweight Conditioner nourishes your hair as it replenishes moisture to reveal silky soft lengths. Both beautiful and practical, Aesop's ethos is all about marrying old world wisdom with new tech disciplines - harnessing the finest botanical extracts and fusing them with the latest and greatest scientific discoveries - to bring out the best of your hair. This luscious formula is infused with a blend of nourishing oils to deeply hydrate your strands and cloak them with an earthy yet citrusy scent that lingers even after you rinse the conditioner away. It's also saturated with amino acids to deliver a wave of stand-softening hydration: this way for sleek and silky hair!
how_to_use: After shampooing, squeeze out excess water. Dispense the desired amount of conditioner into your hands. Apply to the mid-lengths and ends of the hair and ensure even distribution. Rinse thoroughly.
ingredient: Water (Aqua), Brassica Alcohol, Squalane, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Quaternium-87, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Boswellia Carterii Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Cedrus Atlantica (Cedarwood) Bark Oil, Panthenol, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Sodium Gluconate, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Arginine, Jojoba Esters, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Aspartic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, PCA, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sodium Acetate, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Polyglycerin-3, Cellulose, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Phenoxyethanol, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Potassium Sorbate, Disodium EDTA, Limonene, Linalool.

name: Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 15ml Living Proof Triple Bond Complex 15ml
description: The future of hair repair is here in the form of Living Proof's Triple Bond Complex. Think of this as your healthy hair architect that works within your tresses to fortify every strand and help you achieve all your hair care dreams, and with this sized-to-go 15ml you need never go without! Used weekly, this intensive reparative treatment is clinically proven to reconstruct damaged hair, while protecting it against future damage to keep your mane in optimal condition. Chemical treatments, bleach and heat-induced damage all take their toll, but thankfully, the Triple Bond Complex is on hand to deliver immediate repair and lasting protection so your hair is restored to a healthy state. Harnessing the powers of a breakthrough, patent-pending technology, this hair saviour repairs and replenishes ionic, hydrogen and covalent bonds. After just one use you'll see immediate results (the impatient amongst us can rejoice), as it will look and feel healthier, with significant improvements being made inside your strands too. Not forgetting about the element of protection, encapsulated cellular oil can be found within this little bottle of gold dust to protect your hair from thermal and UV damage. All of this in a once-a-week treatment? Our hair care routine is getting upgraded asap!
how_to_use: Shampoo and Condition hair as usual. Then apply 2 pumps to clean, damp hair. Add more as needed, based on hair length, texture, and level of damage. Comb through. Do not rinse out. For best results, wait 10 minutes before applying other treatments or stylers and blow dry. Product does not require heat, but you will see best results with heat activation. Use weekly.

For an accurate listing of ingredients in each product, please refer to your product packaging.

name: OUAI St. Barts Scalp and Body Scrub 250g OUAI St. Barts Scalp and Body Scrub 250g
description: A summer update of the original Scalp & Body Scrub, fly-a-ouai to St. Barts with this limited edition scented version that has notes of dragonfruit, orange blossom, tuberose and baltic amber. Perfect for prepping skin for a day by the beach, a spray tan, or just to transport yourself out of your shower for a minute, this St. Barts Scalp and Body Scrub features the same go-to formula with an intoxicatingly beautiful scent. The perfect reset for scalp and skin alike, this weekly detox is deep cleansing and gently foaming. Powered by gently exfoliating sugar crystals which cleanse and soften skin and conditioning coconut oil to replenish moisture whilst calming the crazy. For even deeper scalp cleansing, Jen Atkin's top tip is to add a small amount of your favourite OUAI shampoo to this superb scrub.
how_to_use: On scalp: In the shower, section wet hair and apply a quarter-size amount directly to the scalp. Rub in circular motions to activate lather, then rinse and follow with conditioner. On body: Apply to damp skin and rub in circular motions to gently exfoliate.
ingredient: Sucrose, Water / Aqua / Eau, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Cocamide Mea, Propanediol, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Silica, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Menthyl Lactate, Epilobium Angustifolium Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Hydrolyzed Hibiscus Esculentus Extract, Apium Graveolens (Celery) Seed Extract, Panthenol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylyl Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Peg-150 Distearate, Cocamide Mipa, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Bht, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Benzoic Acid, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Hydroxide, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance / Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Coumarin, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Linalool

name: Ceremonia Microfiber Hair Towel - Guava Ceremonia Microfiber Hair Towel - Guava
description: If your tresses are in need of some TLC, try Ceremonia’s luxuriously soft microfiber towel. Think of it as a magic wand for fast-drying, smooth and frizz-free hair. Designed to absorb excess water, this towel dries hair faster than traditional cotton versions, while preventing breakage and damage. It’s also a dream for getting ready as you can literally wrap up your locks to dry, while you apply your skin care and make up. The vibrant ‘Guava’ shade will add a fun pop of colour to your bathroom, too.
how_to_use: Put your head in a downward position. Place the wrap on the back of your head with the button at the nape of your neck. Twist the wrap until tight, but still comfortable, and secure in place by fastening the loop to the toggle at the nape of your neck. Try to avoid rubbing your hair as you put the wrap on. Leave the wrap on while you finish getting ready. Once hair is damp or dry, remove the wrap.

name: Davines MINU Illuminating Conditioner 250ml Davines MINU Illuminating Conditioner 250ml
description: A perfect, post-cleanse treatment for fragile, coloured hair, Davines’s MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner replenishes, separates and assists with detangling – minimising ‘stretching’ and breakage – while enhancing hair’s brilliance so your colour looks enviably lustrous. Because the dyeing process compromises hair’s health, use this fortifying and revitalising treatment to infuse each strand with precious nutrients and in turn, bolster hair’s resilience. It’s best used in conjunction with the rest of Davines’s ‘MINU’ range – to protect and enhance the health of chemically-treated tresses.

name: Davines VOLU Volume Enhancing Shampoo 250ml Davines VOLU Volume Enhancing Shampoo 250ml
description: Tailored towards those with fine hair that’s consistently smothered by everyday build-up and environmental grime, VOLU Shampoo gently cleanses without damaging your strands’ structure. With a mixture of mild surfactants to leave hair clean without weighing it down, and hops extract to revitalise, soothe and provide a natural root-boost, this heavenly-scented Shampoo will soon transform limp, lacklustre locks into enviable crowning glories.

name: Gisou Honey Infused Conditioner 240ml Gisou Honey Infused Conditioner 240ml
description: Weightless yet incredibly nourishing, the Honey Infused Hair Conditioner is formulated to hydrate, repair and detangle strands, all while infusing them with a gently floral fragrance. So what makes this conditioner so special? Well, the lightweight formula leaves hair soft and manageable rather than straggly or greasy, and it puts the star ingredient, honey, front and centre. A natural humectant (meaning it slurps up and holds hydration within the hair shaft), honey is packed with vitamins, amino acids and antioxidants to impart strength, help repair damage and add all of the shine.
how_to_use: After shampooing, squeeze out excess water and apply conditioner from the mid-lengths to ends. Distribute evenly throughout the hair and leave on for 1-2 minutes before rinsing.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetrimonium Chloride, Mirsalehi Honey, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Panthenol, Polyquaternium-37, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Parfum (Fragrance)*, Propylene Glycol Dicaprylate/Dicaprate, Sodium Benzoate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Creatine, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Isopropyl Alcohol, Lactic Acid, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Ppg-1 Trideceth-6, Tocopheryl Acetate, Caramel, Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.

name: The Ordinary Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner 240ml The Ordinary Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner 240ml
description: With a minimalistic-yet-effective formula, the Behentrimonium Chloride 2% Conditioner will help to condition, soften and detangle hair without unnecessary, filler ingredients. The star ingredient here — as the name may suggest — is behentrimonium chloride. Though you might not have heard about this ingredient much, it’s likely on the INCI list of some of your favourite conditioners, and The Ordinary have tailored this lightweight formula to hero it at a 2% concentration (a low potency that still allows for the full efficacy of the ingredient). This helps to condition your mane (yes, even if its colour treated!) while adding plenty of slip and helping to detangle strands. In turn, this makes brushing or combing through your hair a whole lot easier, leading to less damage and stress in the long run.
how_to_use: Work the conditioner into wet hair. Rinse. If irritation occurs, rinse off, cease use, and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.
ingredient: Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Phytic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.

name: WetBrush Go Green Mini Detangler - Purple WetBrush Go Green Mini Detangler - Purple
description: Just when we thought we couldn’t love Wet Brush any more, they release a conveniently mini version of the ultra-effective, planet-friendly Go Green Detangler. With all the incredible hair-smoothing qualities of the classic Wet Brush you know (and likely love), this palm-sized brush has one fundamental difference: it’s biodegradable! Made from plant starch and ergonomically designed with a sleek, shiny handle, this is ideal for eliminating knots on both wet and dry locks. This is all due to the revolutionary Intelliflex technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains yielding or unbending as required to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth. But wait, it gets better when you’re ready to replace your brush, you’ll be happy to know that it will naturally biodegrade within five years!
how_to_use: Use to smooth and detangle wet or dry hair. Suitable for all lengths and textures, and especially good for children.
ingredient: Biodegradable Plant Starch.

name: Davines NOUNOU Nourishing Conditioner 250ml Davines NOUNOU Nourishing Conditioner 250ml
description: Restructuring and replenishing, Davines's NOUNOU Conditioner works to prolong the vibrancy of colour-treated hair - providing protection from the ravages wrought by the elements, while strengthening strands and enhancing elasticity to minimise brittleness and breakage. With tomato extract to ward against free radical attack, alongside sweet almond butter and vitamin F to 'rebuild' and intensively nourish from the inside out. Now available in the original (250ml) and a new travel-friendly (75ml), you won't need to go without this hair hero ever again...

name: Amika Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0 Amika Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0
description: Fast track your mane to a salon-worthy blow dry from the comfort of your own home with the Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0 — an even better (if that’s possible) version of the much-loved original two-in-one styler from amika. Bringing your tresses the bouncy, frizz-free blow dry normally reserved for your bi-monthly visit to your hairdresser, is the Hair Blow Dryer Brush 2.0, back to bring your mane more volume, more shine and more effortless styling. Constantly striving to bring you your best hair ever, amika has put their bestselling tool through its paces to unveil and even more effective styling companion. Three adjustable heat and speed settings allow you to customise your blowout to create the volume your strands desire with the smoothness of a salon visit. The carefully carved oval barrel is designed to ensure you achieve optimal root lift for a bounce that just won’t quit, and weighing in at just 380g this lightweight styler won’t leave you feeling like you just left the gym either. A unique combination of short bristles for bounce, shine and polish, and long nylon ball tip bristles to detangle and smooth your strands mean all hair types can enjoy the ultimate ‘at-home’ blow dry.
how_to_use: Start with towel-dried hair. Spray the wizard detangling primer or blockade heat defense serum to protect against heat damage. Turn brush on by rotating the temperature control dial clockwise to the desired setting. Divide hair into sections. Working section by section, maneuver the brush through hair. For extra volume, over-direct sections at the crown of the head.
ingredient: 9 ft / 3 m cord with 360° swivel. 12 (w) x 34 (h) x 9 (d) cm / 4.7 (w) x 13.3 (h) x 3.5 (d) in 120v 60 hz 950w

name: Gisou Propolis Infused Heat Protecting Spray 200ml Gisou Propolis Infused Heat Protecting Spray 200ml
description: So much more than just a heat protectant, the Propolis Infused Heat Protecting Spray enhances your hair’s natural volume, protects hair from heat up to 230ᵒC/446ᵒF and contains a UV-filter to prevent sun damage. Phew… The key here really is propolis, a deeply fortifying ingredient that fuels all of Gisou’s superstar styling range. Produced and used by bees to build strong beehives, propolis contains plenty of oils, vitamins, minerals and flavonoids to protect your hair and keep it at its most healthy — all while create a shield against the drying, breakage-causing effects of heat styling.
how_to_use: Mist evenly from an arm’s length onto towel-dried hair before blow-drying. On dry hair, spray lightly onto divided sections of the hair. Allow to dry before using heated styling tools. Mist evenly from an arm's length before sun exposure.

name: OUAI Thick Hair Conditioner 300ml OUAI Thick Hair Conditioner 300ml
description: A ‘get rich quick’ treatment for thick hair demanding the TLC treatment, OUAI Haircare’s Thick Hair Conditioner rescues ‘big’ hair that’s in need of attention. With replenishing marshmallow root and a strengthening cocktail of keratin, shea and avocado butters to boost elasticity and promote manageability, this frizz-fighting, smoothing and gloss-granting formula renders the most strong-willed strands much more biddable – softening coarse, porous lengths to promote definition and grant a sleek, post-salon swish. Deliciously scented like all OUAI creations, this post-cleansing formula stars the brand’s signature ‘Mercer Street’ perfume – a medley of orange, peony, magnolia, jasmine, musk and orris. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

description: A styler with serious benefits, this defining, de-fluffing and de-frizzing balm deeply conditions every strand it touches — think of this as hair care and a styler in one pretty-in-pink bottle. Best friend to the lazy beauty maven, the Happy Endings Nourishing Balm combines hair care with the styling prowess that Sam McKnight is famed for. In need of a primer to use ahead of styling? This multi-tasking balm perfectly preps your hair and makes light works of styling your ‘do. Is second-day frizz ruining your look? Just a pump or two of this conditioning cream tames flyaways and smooths as you work it through to leave you with perfectly tamed tresses. If your carefully styled curls are lacking definition, fear not, as this powerhouse product adds definition to your waves and curls to keep them perfectly coiffed. Even better? Thanks to ‘Vegabead Microcapsules’ that boost manageability and shine (without adding build-up either), you can re-style and smooth your hair as the day goes on — these shine-boosting microcapsules reactivate whenever you comb or brush your strands… we’re just as impressed as you are!

name: Davines MINU Illuminating Conditioner 250ml Davines MINU Illuminating Conditioner 250ml
description: A perfect, post-cleanse treatment for fragile, coloured hair, Davines’s MINU Illuminating and Protective Conditioner replenishes, separates and assists with detangling – minimising ‘stretching’ and breakage – while enhancing hair’s brilliance so your colour looks enviably lustrous. Because the dyeing process compromises hair’s health, use this fortifying and revitalising treatment to infuse each strand with precious nutrients and in turn, bolster hair’s resilience. It’s best used in conjunction with the rest of Davines’s ‘MINU’ range – to protect and enhance the health of chemically-treated tresses.

name: MALIN + GOETZ Sage Styling Cream MALIN + GOETZ Sage Styling Cream
description: The ultimate helping hand, whether you want to add definition, tame frizz or keep your style in place all-day-long, MALIN + GOETZ’s travel-friendly Sage Styling Cream is your secret weapon for a more manageable mane on-the-go. A trio of sweet almond oil, panthenol and shea butter work together to nourish and strengthen hair - a godsend for the heat-reliant among us - while sage and chamomile oils inject a hit of hydration to parched locks. The ultimate multi-purpose product, the cream is lightweight enough to be used on wet and dry hair to add flexible hold, eye-catching shine and defined texture. If you’re after a more editorial-inspired look, the cream can also be used to nail the ‘sexy slicked back hair’ trend, no heavy gel required.

Earning upwards of 500 reviews, the No 3 Hair Perfector (100ml) is a pre-shampoo that's powered by star ingredient bis-aminopropyl diglycol dimaleate (sounds science-y, we know) to strengthen and repair damage post-colouring, bleaching or heat styling. A daily cleansing and repairing shampoo, the No 4 Bond Maintenance Shampoo (250ml) deeply hydrates and strengthens hairs as well as repairing shattered hair bonds in between your salon or styling sessions, so you can carry on maintaining your favourite hair colour and style without the worry of damaging your hair beyond repair. Follow this with the No 5 Bond Maintenance Conditioner (250ml), which repairs hair bonds and gently restores hydration levels without adding excess weight. This hydrating formula is perfect for eliminating damaged frizz and promoting strong, healthy and shiny hair.

name: Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo 200ml Aveda Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo 200ml
description: When it comes to damaged tresses, it's more important than ever to choose a shampoo that replenishes your hair rather than stripping it; that's where Aveda's Botanical Repair Strengthening Shampoo comes in! Winner of the 'Ultimate Shampoo and Conditioner 2020' Grazia Award, this luxurious cleanser helps to shift excess sebum, product build-up and pollution residue, all while working to strengthen and repair your strands. Designed to counter the daily stresses our hair experiences and restore depleted lengths to their former glory, this 94% naturally derived formula is powered by a medley of plant extracts and oils that encourage the repair of your hair from the inside out, building bonds for stronger hair that's more resistant to damage. This nourishing shampoo is formulated with all hair types and textures in mind and is even safe for colour-treated and chemically processed hair - we think it's time you introduced it to your routine, don't you?

name: Hair by Sam McKnight Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo Hair by Sam McKnight Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo
description: A dry shampoo and a styling product in its own right, Hair by Sam McKnights Lazy Girl Dry Shampoo is perfect for those lazy (or hectically busy!) days in between washes. The ultra-light powder mist absorbs excess oil to refresh hair from scalp to ends. As well as these revitalising capabilities, this hard-working hair hero also imparts enviable body, volume and subtle texture and hold its enough to fool everyone into thinking that your locks are freshly washed. Sam McKnight's top tip is to spray it onto a brush for a lighter effect this is ideal for fringes and for absorbing any excess oil around the hairline, especially after applying skin care or make up. The culmination of McKnights iconic expertise and experience in the industry, his irresistible hair care collection offers the products you need to achieve professional standards of styling at home in mere minutes and we just can't get enough. As well as professional appeal, this dry shampoo smells divine, with a luscious, botanical scent (green leaf, herbs, watery flowers and pepper, against a backdrop of frankincense, cedar and juniper wood crafted by perfumer Lyn Harris) so that your locks will smell sublime as well as looking timelessly chic.Available in a full-size and an all-new travel (50ml) size, you can keep one at home and one close at hand.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. For best results, direct spray into hair roots. Work through the hair with a brush. For a lighter effect (great for fringes and oiliness in the hair line) spray onto a brush and sweep through gently.

name: Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Intensive Treatment 150ml Philip Kingsley Elasticizer Intensive Treatment 150ml
description: An iconic hair hero, Philip Kingsleys Elasticizer will transform your hair care ritual. A luxurious pre-shampoo conditioning treatment, Elasticizer has attained legendary status and legions of fans thanks to its deeply conditioning effects; originally formulated for Audrey Hepburn, it boosts elasticity, manageability, bounce and shine, delivering rich moisture to the cuticle without weighing strands down. Leave it on for a minimum of 10-20 minutes or even overnight for a deep treatment when your hair needs some TLC. A total treat for tresses, the formula stars hydrolysed elastin, castor oil, olive oil and glycerine to boost hydration and lock in moisture, to leave hair looking intensely nourished, healthy and shiny and all before youve used shampoo. Impressive! With frequent use, you can expect stronger, healthier hair and less breakage youll never want to wash your hair without it.
how_to_use: Apply before shampooing Dampen the hair with water and apply Elasticizer in sections to mid-lengths and ends, ensuring maximum coverage Cover hair with a shower cap or towel. The heat created helps the nutrients to be fully absorbed Leave for a minimum of 10-20 minutes, or as long as you wish. You can even sleep in Elasticizer Rinse thoroughly and shampoo and condition as normal. You can shampoo twice if you want to ensure all residue is removed Suitable for use on coloured hair Note: Do not use Elasticizer 72 hours before or after dying your hair as it may affect how the colour takes during this period only

A nourishing cocktail of shea butter and avocado oil (your hair will adore the abundance of oleic and linoleic acid!) imparts an impressive wave of hydration to your hair, while marshmallow root smooths each strand for a silk-like effect. The iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is a beautiful bonus; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a gorgeous scent that lingers even after the suds leave your strands. description: Great hair health begins with the scalp! Enter: Fable & Mane’s crowning glory, the SahaScalp Wild Ginger Purifying Scrub. Whipped up with ginger, neem leaf and amla (also known as Indian gooseberry), the SahaScalp Wild Ginger Purifying Scrub feeds your precious scalp with vitamin C while lending its antiseptic, antifungal and purifying properties to soothe, relieve flakiness and strengthen. Also calling on pink Himalayan salt to stimulate hair follicles and whisk away product build-up, this luxurious scrub prevents flakiness and comes in a deliciously airy texture for a gentle, nurturing lather that feels utterly divine.

name: Grow Gorgeous Hair Growth Serum Intense 60ml Grow Gorgeous Hair Growth Serum Intense 60ml
description: The ultimate treatment for thinning hair that's lacking density, it's time to re-energise your scalp and bring life back to your hair with this potent caffeine infused treatment. name: BLEACH LONDON Lavender Grey Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON Lavender Grey Toner Kit
description: Grey is officially chic… and lilac-tinted grey is even chicer – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Lavender Grey Toner Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add a lavender- grey sheen tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool. It will last for around 16-20 washes on pre-lightened hair.
how_to_use: Lasts for around 16-20 washes. For use on pre-lightened hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH LONDON TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH LONDON DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH LONDON BEACH LIGHTS to lighten hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Hair condition, porosity, length, fineness, shade and any previous treatments. The final effect will depend on your current hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.

name: Oribe Impermeable Spray 200ml Oribe Impermeable Spray 200ml
description: Shield your hard-earned hairdos from the fatal effects of humidity with Oribe’s Imperméable Anti Humidity Spray, a subtly texturising finishing spray with powerful protective benefits. Just the thing if humidity or the weather wreak havoc on your blow dry, curls or sleek straight locks, this fine spray features a ‘Miami-tested’ anti-humidity shield, as well as UV protection and light hold. A unique copolymer enhances and extends the longevity of hairstyles in any climate, while panthenol swells the hair shaft to volumise and pro-vitamin B5 thickens, conditions and builds soft volume. name: Davines This Is A Sea Salt Spray Davines This Is A Sea Salt Spray
description: Bring the beach to your bedroom with Davines’ This is a Sea Salt Spray – the key to achieving those soft, ‘scrunchy’ waves with a quick (and conditioning!) spritz. A great way to emulate all of those chic, ‘piece-y’ styles that you’ve seen on your Instagram feed, as well as to let you pretend that you’re spending a day at the seaside, just shrug on a sundress and fantasise… (no water required).

name: Fable & Mane MahaMane Smooth and Shine Hair Oil (Various Sizes) Fable & Mane MahaMane Smooth and Shine Hair Oil (Various Sizes)
description: Created to help smooth flyaways and protect your strands as you style your hair, the MahaMane Smooth & Shine Hair Oil should be next in line to your styling rituals. If you’re yet to discover the restorative powers of Fable & Mane’s therapeutic range, then allow us to make the necessary introductions… The latest creation from Fable & Mane’s strand-transforming range will upgrade your post-wash hair care routine and protect your hair from thermal damage while it’s at it too. A blend of six fruit oils and shikakai (an ayurvedic herb) are combined in this indulgent treatment to grant a mirror-like shine in an instant. To strengthen your strands, the adaptogenic ayurvedic root known as ashwagandha is infused to keep your hair at its most resilient… and with the added benefit of heat protection, this is a must-add to your styling routine. Available in a full size (55ml) and sized to try (15ml) so you care for your hair in every situation.
how_to_use: Rub a few drops into palms and apply to towel-dried hair from mid-lengths to ends. Add more to longer or thicker hair if needed. Comb through and style as usual. MahaTip: apply to dry ends and flyaways for a smooth finish.

name: Davines MOMO Moisturising Conditioner 250ml Davines MOMO Moisturising Conditioner 250ml
description: This pH 3.5 conditioner is formulated using a group of ingredients that work as a team to quench the thirst of dehydrated hair creating a light, protective layer on each strand. Milk thistle oil, which is packed with essential fatty acids and natural polymer rhizobian gum attract and hold moisture, locking it in to the shaft, but only where it is needed. The pathenol (also known as pro-vitamin B5) and jojoba oil strengthen, soften and add shine without weighing the hair down.

name: VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml VIRTUE One for All 6-in-1 Styler Cream Travel Size 60ml
description: A true innovation in hair care, Virtue’s advanced formulations are enriched with Alpha Keratin 60ku, a whole, human keratin born from regenerative medicine. Since this is identical to the keratin in your hair, the protein is instantly recognised, binding directly to areas of damage and filling them – not just coating strands or weighing them down. Uniting this advanced protein with a host of other powerful ingredients, this One For All 6-In-One Styler truly does it all, providing softness, shine and light hydration, while also strengthening, polishing and protecting from heat. It’s enriched with panthenol (vitamin B5) a natural B vitamin that delivers moisture, softness and shine, cypress, an antioxidant rich essential oil known for light, soothing hydration and strengthening polymers, which work like an invisible scaffold to provide light hold and block out humidity. Fragranced with a fresh, verdant citrus blend featuring sweet orange, cypress and elemi essential oils, this truly is a gift from the hair care gods. What's more, after one week in a clinical trial, 89% of users found their hair felt softer, while 86% reported their hair looked healthier!
how_to_use: Apply to clean, damp or dry hair from mid-shaft to ends.
