name: OUAI Medium Hair Conditioner Refill 946ml OUAI Medium Hair Conditioner Refill 946ml
description: A lesson in deep hydration, the Medium Hair Conditioner tames tangles and control unruly strands to make your styling rituals (whatever they may be!) a whole lot easier. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage smooth, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of babassu and coconut oil grants virtually endless hydration to your hair. Last but definitely not least, the miracle ingredient behind this conditioner’s glossy shine and silk-like finish is vitamin-rich kumquat fruit extract. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is another beautiful bonus; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a gorgeous scent that lingers even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.

name: Melanin Haircare Twist-Elongating Style Cream 475ml Melanin Haircare Twist-Elongating Style Cream 475ml
description: Designed to adapt to your hair's specific needs, the Twist-Elongating Styling Cream by Melanin Haircare nourishes, defines and detangles in one do-it all formula. The lightweight and buildable cream features five rich hair butters that work in harmony to condition the strands, including shea, mango, cocoa, kokum and cupuaçu. The benefits don't end there, as a blend of aloe vera, avocado, sweet almond oil and argan oil (phew) deliver a much-needed boost of hydration. Whether your hair is wet, dry, thick or thin, this versatile styling cream leaves strands ready to face the day.

name: Philip Kingsley Body Building Conditioner 200ml Philip Kingsley Body Building Conditioner 200ml
description: To give your hair maximum volume while gently hydrating, Philip Kingsley's Body Building Conditioner boosts fine, limp hair with weightless body and bounce. Ideal for flat hair that's prone to getting oily quickly, the formula plumps each and every strand for a thicker, fuller effect. It's enriched with wheat protein to both achieve this plumping and strengthen, as well as silicone to add shine and reduce static, all without adding any unwanted weight. Meanwhile, behentrimonium chloride smooths the cuticle and quickly detangles. Suitable for daily use and safe for colour-treated hair, Body Building Conditioner makes fine hair healthier and more manageable. And now this 'oomph'-boosting formula comes in a handy travel size (75ml) too because nobody fancies flat hair on their holidays.

Cue: advert-worthy tresses in 3, 2, 1...

description: A superfine, weightless leave-in mist, this Wild Marula Tangle Spray effectively detangles and smooths while restoring natural movement, manageability and shine without weighing hair down. Introducing Drunk Elephant's all-new and utterly must-have hair and body range, created by the brand's CEO, Tiffany because "Skin is skin - and whether we call it the scalp or the eye area or the legs, it can only function at its healthiest when it’s treated with smart, nourishing, skin-compatible ingredients. All skin deserves to be respected with ingredients it can get along with." Created in collaboration with professional hair stylist - and creator of 'The Rachel' haircut - Chris McMillan, together they created a line of hair care that focuses on the scalp - products that dissolve years of buildup while nourishing hair with biocompatible proteins and oils. The rest just grew from there. Formulated with plant oils and advanced, silicone-free smoothing and anti-static agents to provide heat protection, this superfine, weightless leave-in mist from Drunk Elephant unites a host of strengthening, conditioning and protecting good-to-hair ingredients that will leave hair with noticeably more body, bounce and manageability that's protected while heat styling too!

Inspired by the lift and volume of styles from the past, My Nanna's Mousse is a lightweight styler that preps hair for blow drying. It helps to boost elasticity and provides soft hold that feels as if you’ve used no product at all. Best of all, it’s been designed to be suitable for all hair textures.

name: Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 95ml Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray 95ml
description: Achieve fuller-looking hair with the Living Proof Full Dry Volume & Texture Spray. Delivering volume, texture and a long-lasting finish, the styling spray helps create salon-worthy results. Dispensing texturising molecules throughout the hair, the spray instantly elevates your locks, adding dimension and voluminous shape. The improved valve enables a controlled distribution and a softer spritz, allowing you to have more precision over the product. Formulated to provide heat protection up to 210°C, the spray is compatible for use with heated styling tools.

Begin spraying from the root, moving through to the ends of the hair and work in with your fingers. To create even more volume, tilt your head sideways or upside down and apply for bigger results.

name: Amika Blockade Heat Defense Serum Amika Blockade Heat Defense Serum
description: If you like to straighten your mane or create a voluminous blow dry you need to make sure you’re keeping your hair protected at every turn and flick of your chosen tool. This is where the Blockade Heat Defense Serum comes in — defending your hair against up to 450 degrees and leaving you with a salon-worthy finish. Created for all hair types, this lightweight serum does more than just protect your strands while you style. Keep thirsty locks in perfect condition with this moisturising heat protector, optimised with omega-rich sea buckthorn to promote hair elasticity and provide intense levels of hydration even when using high levels of heat. Just a few drops of this moisture-locking protector is all you need to keep your hair healthy, protected and free from frizz. Our top tip? Double up and use this after you’ve finished your style to add extra shine and smooth flyaways!

FOR FINISHING: After styling to smooth flyaways, add shine, and calm frizz, apply one to two pumps into the palm of your hand and evenly distribute throughout the mid-length to ends of hair.

Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this revitalising formula is brimming with botanical extracts – including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf. Add to this magic potion extracts of daisy and honeysuckle and expect hair to be fortified from roots to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe’s signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative blend has just upped the ante on building strong, resilient hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity, while green tea and plant polysaccharides protect from environmental stressors by warding off any pollution particles that are tempted to sit on your precious locks. Just one rinse of this super hydrating formula will leave your hair feeling strong, smooth and soft.

name: Color Wow Dream Coat Anti-Frizz Treatment Supersize 500ml Color Wow Dream Coat Anti-Frizz Treatment Supersize 500ml
description: Obsessed with Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray? Well you can now stock up on this Holy grail hero to last even longer thansk to the Supersize which helps seals each strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak - perfect for fighting frizz. If you colour your hair, your strands are probably more porous and vulnerable to humidity - which means more risk of frizz! Introducing Color Wow's Dream Coat Supernatural Spray, which 'shrinkwraps' every strand with an invisible waterproofing cloak to prevent frizz and flyaways. description: Too busy (or lazy…) to wash your hair? Fear not – Philip Kingsley’s fabulous formula will keep your mane magnificent for another day. name: Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush Drybar The Double Shot Blow-Dryer Brush
description: We're pretty sure it's not just us that has spent hours on end trying to grapple with a barrel brush and hair dryer to create the hairdresser-level blow-dry at home… only to end up with aching arms and frizzy, flat hair that simply refuses to cooperate. If this picture resonates a little too profoundly with you then (thankfully) Drybar has just the tool to solve all your hair woes. The Double Shot Oval Blow-Dryer Brush combines the hot air of a hair dryer with the structure and shape of a round brush to help you create the lusted-after blowout of dreams. Gone are the days of trying to coordinate two tools and constantly rest your aching arms, this does all the work for you. Great for hair types from wavy to curly and poker straight, this ergonomically-designed tool is lightweight and easy to use so you can style your hair stress-free. Customise your blowout with three temperature settings, and the combination of nylon and tufted bristles brings you total control and optimal tension over your tresses. Worried about frizzy strands ruining your 'do? The clever minds at Drybar have infused ionic technology into The Double Shot to help seal the hair cuticle and leave your strands shining and frizz-free. You can use this on wet or even dry hair to extend the life of your style and create a smooth, complete look between hair wash days. The at-home blow-dry just got a seriously effortless upgrade…
how_to_use: After shampooing, thoroughly towel-dry hair to remove excess water. Brush out hair using a detangling brush or comb, and separate into large sections. Place The Double Shot underneath each section and work it slowly from roots to ends until the section is dry and smooth. For Volume at the Roots: Use horizontally at the crown and pull through from roots to ends in an upward motion. For Extra Thick or Long Hair: Rough dry with a regular blow-dryer before using The Double Shot. To Extend Your Blowout: Use on DRY hair to create a smooth, finished look.
ingredient: Dual Plug

name: Amika The Wizard Detangling Primer Amika The Wizard Detangling Primer
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika’s mantra is “all hair is welcome”. No exception to the rule, The Wizard Detangling Spray is the ultimate pre-game potion before the main magic (read: styling) begins. Suitable for all hair types, from straight to curly and coily, this all-in-one lightweight hair priming spray has an abundance of benefits but its ability to leave your hair shiny and silky-soft takes the winning spot to us. As for the others, it protects hair against heat up to 450°F; provides ultra-hydration, detangles and smooths strands for a lustrous mane, and even cuts down on blow dry time so you can get on with your day! Psst, did we mention is safe for colour-treated, Brazilian-treated and keratin-treated hair? Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.

name: The Ordinary Hair Care Natural Moisturising Factors and HA 60ml The Ordinary Hair Care Natural Moisturising Factors and HA 60ml
description: With a lightweight, non-greasy formula, The Ordinary's Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA for Scalp serum brings all the benefits of skin care to your scalp, stopping dryness and dehydration in their tracks while also maintaining the integrity of your moisture barrier (yes, even on your scalp!) Mirroring the formula of their very similar product designed to target your face, this lightweight, serum heroes two key ingredients: hyaluronic acid and natural moisturising factors, to strengthen and moisturise sensitive or dry skin. A much-beloved humectant, hyaluronic acid absorbs water from the air, holding it within the skin and offering a flood of hydration. Natural moisturising factors also help to keep the outer layers of skin hydrated and protected, thanks to a mix of multiple amino acids, fatty acids and ceramides. And don't worry about this serum leaving hair looking greasy: the thin, milky texture allows for easy distribution on the scalp, without sticking to the hair and weighing down the roots.
how_to_use: Shake well before use. Massage a few drops thoroughly into clean, dry scalp once daily, ideally at bedtime. This formula is a leave-in treatment. Do not wash hair or scalp after application. If irritation occurs, rinse off, cease use, and consult a physician. Use only as directed on unbroken skin. Patch testing prior to use is advised. Keep out of reach of children.

Your locks will be left sleek, chic and soft – without being weighed down.
how_to_use: Apply YOUNG.AGAIN to freshly washed hair and before any styling products are used. Once dried you can apply a small amount to dry hair to further smooth the hair and remove any fly-aways.
ingredient: Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Dimethiconol, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Helichrysum Stoechas Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Hexapeptide-11, Cyclohexasiloxane, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Betaine, Myristyl Myristate, Quaternium-91, Vinyl Butyl Ether, Water (Aqua) (Eau), Behentrimonium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Hexylene Glycol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Geraniol, Hydroxyisohexyl 3-Cyclohexene Carboxaldehyde, Violet 2 (CI 60725)

name: HELLO KLEAN Shower Head Refill Cartridges HELLO KLEAN Shower Head Refill Cartridges
description: A hero for skin and hair, the HELLO KLEAN Purifying Shower Head tackles the drying effects of hard water - no plumbing qualification or water softening system required. When it's ready for a refresh, simply swap in a new Shower Head Refill Cartridges to continue saving water, boosting pressure and filtering out unwanted metals, chlorine and impurities. Featuring advanced two-step filtration powered by amino acids, activated carbon fibre and KDF 55, this clever shower system head removes water-soluble metals (including lead, iron, mercury and nickel), trihalomethane (THMs) and odour. This softer water is kinder on skin and hair, and the boosted pressure makes short work of rinsing out suds for lightweight locks and happier skin.
how_to_use: Remove the Purifying Shower Head and lay on a flat, stable surface. Place a wrench onto the triangle tip of the shower head, handle facing outwards. Place one hand on the wrench, and hold Shower Head with your other hand. Press down and steadily turn the headpiece counterclockwise. Refill the headpiece cartridge. Twist the bottom handle counterclockwise to swap out the carbon cartridge.

name: Function of Beauty Strengthen #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml Function of Beauty Strengthen #Hairgoal Booster Shots 11.8ml
description: Feeling your hair grow weaker and weaker as the days go on? Enter: Strengthen Hair Goal which shoots for total strand protection and increased elasticity and scores! Slotting right into your wash day routine with ease, this booster shot harnesses the power of hair-reviving pea sprout extract to add a much-needed splash of resilience. Renewing your hair from root-to-tip, this 100% vegan blend of scalp-loving essentials stimulates healthy hair growth and wards off breakage, split ends and dryness. New hair, who’s this?
how_to_use: Snap open your #hairgoal. Pour 1 shot into any of your Function of Beauty hair care bases. Each box contains 2 shots. Shake (or stir!) for 15 seconds!
ingredient: Water (Aqua/Eau), Pisum Sativum (Pea) Sprout Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol.

name: Color Wow Root Cover Up 1.9g (Various Shades) Color Wow Root Cover Up 1.9g (Various Shades)
description: Available in eight colour-correcting hues, this weightless mineral powder clings to your hair to cover the look of greys and any dark roots that threaten to peek out to deliver seamless, consolidated colour. Complete with a mirror and double-ended application brush (one side flat for broad sweeps and one small and domed for targeted precision), colour cover-ups have never been so easy. It settles over your strands with a never stiff, sticky or waxy finish, instead, youre bound to forget you even applied it. The no-mess formula is designed to last from one shampoo to the next, withstanding even your most restless nights and high-energy workouts. Just when we thought we couldnt love them anymore, these powders have a water-resistant finish so swimming is never off the cards!
how_to_use: Apply to dry hair. Load up the small end of the brush with powder. Use free hand to pull hair flat/taut against head and press brush down firmly into roots, starting from scalp and working out - do not use sweeping motion. Apply more powder as needed. To extend highlights, use the side edge of the small brush. Lightly dust off any excess powder with wide end of the brush.

name: Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Super Moisture Shampoo for Damaged Hair Briogeo Don't Despair, Repair! Super Moisture Shampoo for Damaged Hair
description: An ingenious shampoo for dry, damaged hair, Briogeo’s Don't Despair, Repair! Super Moisture Shampoo unites the intense cleansing action of a shampoo with the rich, luscious moisture of a deep conditioning mask. Offering the best of all worlds, it neither strips hair of colour nor overburdens it with moisture, leaving it hydrated yet free from dirt, oil and build-up. Fortified with the same ingredients as Briogeo’s Don't Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Mask, the formula features vitamin and mineral-rich algae extract to nourish locks, strengthening biotin, moisture-boosting panthenol and richly hydrating rose oil. A sumptuous way to clean both scalp and strands, this is ideal for those who want the hydration of a co-wash with the more thorough cleansing benefits of a traditional shampoo.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair and vigorously massage from root to tip, then rinse. For best results, condition with {Briogeo’s Don't Despair, Repair! Deep Conditioning Mask}.

name: Davines Heart of Glass Intense Treatment 150ml Davines Heart of Glass Intense Treatment 150ml
description: An intense cosmetic treatment to reinforce blonde tones, Davines’ Heart of Glass Intense Treatment strengthens the hair fibre, helping to prevent breakage, for nourished hair, immediately brightened. Part of Davines ‘Heart of Glass’ edit – which derives its name from a famous song from the 80s, sang by a very blonde artist who has become an icon – this collection of products are designed to highlight the beauty of blonde hair, both natural and bleached, lightened and dyed; or hair that has been exposed to sunlight, the frequent use of the brushes or straighteners, all elements that could weaken its fibre. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (Heart of Glass, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this shampoo, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!
how_to_use: Apply to towel-dried hair along lengths and ends. Leave on for 5 to 10 minutes, comb and rinse thoroughly. If needed, follow with Heart of Glass Rich Conditioner. Use once a week, or more often if hair is very damaged. Rinse thoroughly in case of contact with eyes.

name: Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit Olaplex Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit
description: Calling all blondes! Say goodbye to dull, brassy, brittle hair with the Unbreakable Blondes Mini Kit, a four-step ritual designed to restore visible strength and vibrancy to blonde, lightened and grey hair. Working as a two-part system, the No.0 Hair Treatment and No.3 Hair Perfector™ draw upon the brand’s patented bond-building technology to repair visible damage and brittleness. Next up is No.4P Blonde Enhancer™ Toning Shampoo, a purple shampoo formulated to banish brassiness and brighten your blonde; all while cleansing hair of impurities. Completing your vibrancy-boosting routine, No.8 Bond Intense Moisture Mask restores weightless moisture (goodbye dry, dehydrated hair), adds shine and enhances smoothness.
how_to_use: No.0 (40ml): Before you wash your hair, apply No.0 slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip and working into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Hair should be damp, not drenched. Let process for 10 minutes then follow with No.3. Do not rinse at any point. No.3 (30ml): Use directly after No.0. Apply generously to damp hair from scalp to ends until hair is thoroughly saturated. Leave on for a minimum of 10 minutes (or longer if desired). Then, rinse well. No.4P (20ml): Apply to wet hair. Lather fully and leave on for 1-3 minutes. Rinse well. For more intense toning, leave on hair up to 5 minutes. No.8 (20ml): Apply mask to clean, damp hair mid-length to ends and work through with fingers. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse well and style as usual. Start with 2 pumps for shoulder-length hair. Use more for longer, thicker hair, and less for fine or short hair.
ingredient: No. 0: Water (Aqua/Eau), Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate. No.3: Water (Aqua/Eau), Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Cetyl Alcohol, Phenoxyethanol, Glycerin, Hydroxyethyl Ethylcellulose, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Quaternium-91, Sodium Benzoate, Cetrimonium Methosulfate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-37, Benzyl Benzoate, Etidronic Acid, Ascorbic Acid, Phytantriol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate. name: R+Co Television Perfect Hair Shampoo (Various Sizes) R+Co Television Perfect Hair Shampoo (Various Sizes)
description: The perfect way to introduce yourself to this renowned brand, R+Co's Perfect Hair Shampoo can be used by absolutely anyone to achieve truly beautiful, healthy and perfect camera-ready hair. Housed in R+Co's signature white opaque bottles with a chic, white noise television design, this bottle is the stuff of dreams. Formulated with juniper berry extract to help maintain your scalp's optimal oil balance while adding weightless moisture, this amazing ingredient also detoxifies hair follicles and soaks up impurities on the hair and scalp to keep it healthy. Glycerin also helps to retain moisture and maintains moisture balance in hair while badassu seed oil deeply conditions and moisturises hair and scalp dryness. Scented with DARK WAVES (a warming and romantic blend of cardamom, pineapple, tangerine, lavender, bamboo and blonde woods) this is a must-have addition to your collection as well as a perfect gift for any friend as it caters to all hair types. Packaged in a sleek white opaque tube with quintessential R+Co imagery, TELEVISION (like the rest of this unmissable range) is vegan, cruelty-free, gluten-free, colour-safe and free from parabens, sulphates, mineral oils and petrolatum. Trustworthy and transparent, you need this hair care range in your life. Available in a sized-to-try bottle (50ml) as well as the original (241ml), now's the time to discover this hair care essential.
how_to_use: Spread across and through hair, rinse and follow with R+Co's {TELEVISION Perfect Hair Conditioner}.

name: OUAI Medium Hair Shampoo Refill 946ml OUAI Medium Hair Shampoo Refill 946ml
description: Delivering a very happy medium, this gently refreshing shampoo restores control and near-blinding shine to hair that feels dry and dull. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin to encourage smooth, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of babassu and coconut oil grants deeply nourishing hydration to your hair. Last but definitely not least, the miracle ingredient behind this shampoo’s glossy shine is vitamin-rich kumquat fruit extract. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is beautiful bonus; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a gorgeous scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.
how_to_use: Massage into wet hair - pause to admire the delicious scent - then rinse away.

name: Davines Naturaltech Nourishing Vegetarian Miracle Conditioner 250ml Davines Naturaltech Nourishing Vegetarian Miracle Conditioner 250ml
description: Formulated for hair in serious need of repair and intensive hydration, this Davines Nourishing Vegetarian Miracle Conditioner is jam-packed with reparative and protective antioxidant, acai oil as well as grape phytoceuticals which boast therapeutic benefits for dry, damaged and brittle strands. Helping to balance hydration levels as well as strengthening compromised locks, this hard-working hero will deliver visible results with continued use. Housed in a minimalist deep brown tub with quintessential Davines packaging, this Nourishing Vegetarian Miracle Conditioner will look right at home in your bathroom while delivering effective use with continuous use.
how_to_use: Apply to towel-dried hair through the lengths and ends. Leave on for 10 minutes, then comb through and rinse thoroughly.

name: Amika The Kure Multi-Task Repair Treatment Amika The Kure Multi-Task Repair Treatment
description: The brainchild of a collective of creatives, hairstylists, chemists and formula enthusiasts, amika's mantra is 'all hair is welcome'. Centred around dry, damaged tresses, The Kure Multi-Repair Treatment is a fast-acting rinse-out mask that also doubles as a leave-in treatment; the ultimate form of damage control, it works to strengthen your strands and repair damage in a mere 60 seconds! Think: freshly trimmed ends in a treatment. (We can dream...) Clinically proven to repair and strengthen the damage caused by everyday stressors, heat and chemical treatments (compared to control after three uses), this bond repair treatment is a hair necessity for depleted strands. Packed with bond cure technology, it targets the most abundant bonds in your hair, which break the most frequently during daily wear and tear. What's more, it is infused with plant butters (think: mango butter extract, borage oil and shea butter) and vegan proteins to lend the formula an abundance of conditioning omega fatty acids, vitamins and minerals. Your strands will thank you for it! Committed to creating formulas that fit your values, all amika products are cruelty-free, held in 100% recyclable packaging and made with 90%+ post-consumer recycled plastics to reduce virgin plastic production.
how_to_use: Fine hair types: after using the kure bond repair shampoo and conditioner, apply multi-task repair hair treatment from roots to ends. leave on for at least 1 minute and rinse. Coarse hair types: after using the kure bond repair shampoo, apply multi-task repair hair treatment from roots to ends. leave on for at least 1 minute and rinse. follow with kure bond repair conditioner. Pro tip: for stronger results, can be used as a leave in treatment. Next, apply a dime-sized amount of the closer to hair, mid lengths to ends, prior to any additional styling products. focus on damaged ends. add more as needed. For best results, use multi-task 1-2x per week with the entire kure system
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage/Bourrache) Seed Oil, Plukenetia Volubilis Seed Oil, PEG-50 Shea Butter, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Mangifera Indica (Mango/Mangue) Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Quinoa, Glycerin, Amodimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Chloride*, Bis-PCA Dimethicone, C11-15 Pareth-7, Laureth-9, Aminomethyl Propanol, Trideceth-12, Disodium PEG-12 Dimethicone Sulfosuccinate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Tocopherol, Acetic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Xanthan Gum, Sorbic Acid, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Citronellol, Coumarin *antistatic agent/ agent antistatique.

name: ghd Max Styler Straightener ghd Max Styler Straightener
description: Ideal for long, thick or curly tresses, the ghd max styler has all the mane-changing benefits of the cult-adored original styler but with larger 2 inch plates. These smooth floating plates have been designed with ghd’s advanced ceramic heat technology, allowing a consistent temperature of 185ºC to be maintained for optimal styling – cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. The result? Smoother, healthier, frizz-free locks with salon-quality shine. The clever features don’t end there: a rounded barrel allows for effortless snag-free styling, particularly when creating curls, while a ultra-speedy 30 second heat up time makes it a godsend on rushed mornings. It takes safety very seriously indeed too with a travel-friendly heat resistant protective plate guard and (best of all) an automatic sleep mode that switches the device off after 30 minutes – welcome relief for those heart-wrenching ‘did I leave my straighteners on’ moments.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. Once the Styler has heated, use it to straighten, curl or create waves. Leave the Styler to cool, then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the Styler or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The styler has a UK three-pin plug and is 68-75W.

name: Briogeo Superfoods Banana and Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray 51ml Briogeo Superfoods Banana and Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray 51ml
description: Beach day anyone? Where tousled tresses meet the crashing waves on the shore for a fun and flirty ‘do that needs a little zsushing up, the Superfoods Banana + Coconut Soft Wave Texture Spray Travel Size delivers vitamin-rich nourishment to your locks on-the-go… Leaving the saltiness for the ocean water, this wave-enhancing formula is bursting with hair-strengthening vitamin B5 that supports your strands, fruit-derived antioxidants, potassium-packed banana extract that deeply nourishes parched hair and hydrating coconut sugar which encourages piecy separation for the most effortless looking beach waves. Now available in travel-friendly size that you can easily slot into your beach bag or tote, refresh your waves as you make your way to the sandy shores. Totally non-drying and suitable for both keratin and colour-treated hair, this deliciously scented hair spritz is the perfect beach bag essential.
how_to_use: Spray throughout damp or dry hair. Scrunch or twist hair to enhance wave formation, then air dry to finish. For optimal results, use a diffuser to enhance your wave or curl pattern.
ingredient: Water/Aqua/Eau, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Pullulan, Sucrose, Musa Sapientum (Banana) Peel Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Ananas Sativus (Pineapple) Fruit Extract, Citric Acid, Hedychium Coronarium Root Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Juice, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Panthenol, Glycerin, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Silica, Lactobacillus, Glyceryl Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-6 Oleate, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Sodium Surfactin, Fragrance (Parfum), Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol.

name: Philip Kingsley Daily Damage Defence Leave-In Conditioner 250ml Philip Kingsley Daily Damage Defence Leave-In Conditioner 250ml
description: Dont even think about brandishing your straighteners until youve sprayed Philip Kingsleys Daily Damage Defence Conditioning Spray. An award-winning leave-in conditioning spray, the formula has been called an everyday Elasticizer, utilising hydrolysed elastin to add strength, body and elasticity, alongside protein-rich almond seedcake extract and moisturising panthenol. Surprisingly lightweight given its impressive conditioning capabilities, this makes both wet and dry hair easy to detangle, improving manageability and reducing breakage as it guards against the damage wrought by heated styling tools and the daily environmental onslaught caused by UV rays.

name: Oribe Bright Blonde Sun Lightening Mist 90 ml. Oribe Bright Blonde Sun Lightening Mist 90 ml.
description: If the idea of bleaching makes you feel a bit uneasy, try the Bright Blonde Sun Lightening Mist for holiday-esque highlights – sunny skies optional. Ideal for lighter hair tones, this mist will gradually illuminate and brighten your colour under the heat of the sun (or hairdryer, if you aren’t blessed with cooperative weather) with a natural blend of lemon and chamomile. Completely peroxide-free, use this to boost hair with moisture while imparting UV protection, for endlessly shiny, healthy-looking hair that’s protected from damage and dryness. Oribe’s ‘Signature Complex’ (boosted by watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower) defends hair from oxidative stress, photoaging and the deterioration of your natural keratin stores, while chamomile extract enhances tone and luminosity, and a ‘Tropical Extract Blend’ of papaya, hibiscus and gardenia works to nourish, soften and smooth each hair cuticle.
how_to_use: Shake well. Mist on damp or dry hair where you want to create highlights or all over. Bask in the sun or blow dry to gradually brighten. Repeat daily until desired illumination is achieved.

name: OUAI Super Dry Shampoo 127g OUAI Super Dry Shampoo 127g
description: From celebrity coiffeuse Jen Atkin – responsible for maintaining the manes of Klan Kardashian, Gigi Hadid and Gwen Stefani (to name a few) – OUAI’s Super Dry Shampoo helps to clean and volume while lightly fragrancing your mane. Phenomenally oil-absorbent but non-powdery, this is so featherweight that it’s completely invisible – refreshing hair in-between washes and adding root ‘oomph’ to hair that’s falling flat. It’s a definite must-have addition to your hair care arsenal (and it looks très chic in your bathroom cabinet/desk drawer/handbag…). Available in a sized-to-try bottle (56g) as well as the original (127g), now's the time to discover this wash day-delaying hero.
how_to_use: Shake it up. Holding the bottle 6" from your hair, blast roots then, flip hair over and fluff with your fingers. Jen's Tip: Apply to dry hair to revitalise yesterday’s style for perfectly lived in hair.

name: Malin + Goetz Peppermint Shampoo 236ml Malin + Goetz Peppermint Shampoo 236ml
description: If you’re morning shower is as much a wake-up call as it is a scrub-a-dub-dub, MALIN + GOETZ’ Peppermint Shampoo is definitely for you. With a reviving peppermint scent, it’s blended with natural peppermint extract to give your hair (and your energy levels) and fresh zing without being overpowering. The gentle formula is cleverly infused with amino acid-based cleansing agents which remove dirt, excess oil and product build-up without stripping or drying the hair or scalp. Instead, it leaves your locks soft and sleek – what’s not to love?
how_to_use: Massage a small amount onto wet hair and scalp to create a gentle lather. Rinse clean.

name: Pacifica Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum Pacifica Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum
description: Designed to detoxify and loosen the product build-up, Pacifica’s Scalp Love Rosemary Mint Serum is infused herbal extracts of sage, thyme and witch hazel to bring balance to your scalp. Made in the USA with best globally sourced ingredients, this rosemary and mint-scented serum is the perfect way to purify congested scalps without disrupting the delicate ecosystem. As soothing and hydrating as it is detoxifying, this cocktail of panthenol, aloe leaf juice, sage, thyme and witch hazel can be used as a purifying pre-shampoo step or as an overnight treatment to thoroughly refresh your scalp.
how_to_use: Apply 2 to 4 droppers and massage into scalp. Shampoo after use or can be used as an overnight treatment. Use one time per week.

name: Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum Fable & Mane Sahascalp Amla Soothing Serum
description: As Hindu mythology would have it, the amla tree grew from where Brahma’s tears hit the earth during meditation. Said to have been the first ever tree to germinate, its berries are rich in vitamin C and a popular Ayurvedic remedy for keeping scalps in tip-top condition. Delightfully weightless, the SahaScalp Amla Soothing Serum harnesses the power of amla to deeply condition hair and soothe itchy scalps. Bakuchi (extracted from babchi plant seeds) balances the crown chakra and helps to rejuvenate sensitive skin while hydrating and encouraging skin cell regeneration. Aloe then strengthens and nourishes dry scalps, and vitamin E cools itchiness. A root-to-tip nourishing elixir, this serum nourishes hair, clears product build-up from the scalp, softens hair, smooths cuticles, adds shine and protects hair from further breakage — all with a deliciously mindful scent that instils a sense of peace and calm. Think: a chakra-balancing blend of ripe blackcurrant with tea rose and fresh orange blossom on a bed of woody amber and musk.
how_to_use: Part dry hair. Apply a few drops for fine hair, one full dropper for thick hair. Rub between your palms. Massage into scalp with a focus on your crown to release stress. Focus on dry areas of the scalp. Follow this ritual bi-weekly; for best results leave in overnight. For a deeper treatment, massage a generous amount onto scalp, rinse then cleanse. Safe for all scalp types and suitable for colour-treated hair. Formulated without silicones, parabens, phthalates, sulphates, animal derived ingredients. Cruelty-free and vegan.
ingredient: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coconut Alkanes, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, C13-15 Alkane, Emblica Officinalis Fruit Extract, Psoralea Corylifolia Seed Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Nigella Sativa Seed Oil, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Melia Azadirachta Extract, Butylene Glycol, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene

name: Amika Mirrorball High Shine + Protect Antioxident Conditioner Amika Mirrorball High Shine + Protect Antioxident Conditioner
description: Prepare to spellbind with hair that shines so bright, it’s as radiant as a mirrorball. This aptly named, antioxidant-rich conditioner is the answer to getting salon-worthy results at home. It’s formulated with sea buckthorn — a deeply nourishing power plant that works to lock-in and replenish moisture, while restoring elasticity and promoting hair growth. The ‘Mirrorball’ is also designed to protect colour vibrancy while protecting against build-up caused by pollution and free radicals. Intended for fine-to-medium hair types, use yours alongside the brand’s coordinating shampoo for beautiful, bouncy locks that you can’t stop running your fingers through.
how_to_use: Squeeze excess water out of hair, then apply product from mid-lengths to ends, using a comb to detangle and evenly disperse the conditioner. Leave on for two to three minutes, rinse thoroughly, then finish with cool water to seal in moisture and close the cuticles. For best results, use after the Mirrorball High Shine + Protect Antioxidant Shampoo.

name: Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml Living Proof Full Shampoo 236ml
description: When hair falls flat, you feel flat – which is why the brains and beauty experts behind Living Proof’s Full Shampoo, strove tirelessly to develop new and innovative technology, to create body and volume that lasts! Powdered by the brand's patented Healthy Hair Molecule (OFPMA), this must-have body-builder helps cleanse delicate hair types, whilst repelling dirt and oil to ensure your hair is not weighed down, promoting natural-looking fullness without any stiffness or restrictive weight. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies – and without parabens, sulphates or silicones – Living Proof abandoned the usual shampoo ‘recipe’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Apply Full Shampoo to wet hair. Massage into a rich lather, focusing on the roots. Rinse. Follow with Full Conditioner. Note: This shampoo is suitable for coloured hair.

name: BLEACH LONDON Rose Shampoo 250ml BLEACH LONDON Rose Shampoo 250ml
description: As well as gently cleansing your hair, BLEACH London’s Rosé Shampoo imparts a subtle touch of stunning pink colour. It can be used to neutralise unwanted green tones in your hair, or to enhance blonde shades with a soft, pastel pink rinse. Ideal followed with BLEACH’s {Rosé Conditioner}, this is the perfect way to change up your style without making a big colour commitment. What’s more, like the entire BLEACH line, the luscious formula is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason to love it.
how_to_use: Lather into wet hair and massage through to the ends. Leave for 2-3 minutes. Rinse well and follow with BLEACH’s {Rosé Conditioner}.

name: OUAI Air Dry Foam - 120ml OUAI Air Dry Foam - 120ml
description: Air drying is the new blow drying and, with characteristic style, hair stylist extraordinaire Jen Atkin has come up with the ultimate answer: Air Dry Foam. The innovative ‘wash and wear’ formula enhances and encourages your hair’s natural wave patterns for more consistency, softer strands, minimised frizz and boosted definition. Perfect for those with wavy or curly hair, you simply massage the foam into damp hair, scrunch and go – waves will dry into the perfect ‘beachy’ shape without frizz or crunch. Kale protein, carrot protein and panthenol nourish and strengthen hair, adding touchable texture and keeping your mane happy as well as magnificent. The lazy option never looked so good…
how_to_use: For girls with wavy or curly hair, massage into damp hair, scrunch and go. Waves will dry in a perfect ‘beachy’ shape without frizz or crunch.

name: Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo Briogeo Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo
description: With Briogeo’s Scalp Revival Charcoal + Biotin Dry Shampoo, you can continue your dry shampoo dependency without damaging scalp or strands. Unlike some dry shampoos, which can create dry flakiness, this features a host of natural, lock-loving ingredients to detoxify hair as it cleanses and refreshes between washes. Binchotan charcoal draws away impurities, while a complex of clay, tapioca and rice starches absorbs excess oil at the roots to leave hair fresh and clean. With the addition of witch hazel extract to help normalise oil production, this is a long-term solution for oily scalps, as well as a quick-fix blow dry prolonger. Super-vitamin biotin provides essential nutrients to the hair follicle, stimulating and supporting healthy hair growth.
how_to_use: Shake well before use and twist the cap to reveal spray dispenser. Squeeze the bottle and dispense evenly five inches away from hair, focusing at the roots. Let the dry shampoo sit for two minutes and then brush or finger through the hair thoroughly until the powder is removed.

name: KEVIN MURPHY Everlasting.Colour Wash (Various Sizes) KEVIN MURPHY Everlasting.Colour Wash (Various Sizes)
description: Forget breaking up with coloured hair, this ph-balanced, sulphate-free shampoo is designed to keep hue-tiful hair in check so you never have to part with it. More than your average shampoo, KEVIN.MURPHY has designed this hard-working hair hero to lock in colour from the inside out. Knowing that coloured hair needs that extra bit of TLC, this formula works on a follicle level to build strength from within to reveal stronger, healthier hair. and closes the cuticle to add next-level shine. It also has nourishing and hydrating properties to bring your hair back from the brink of dehydration. A little goes a long way with this lightweight texture and results in hair that feels instantly rejuvenated and colour-revived.
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair. Gently massage into hair and scalp. Rinse and repeat.

name: Coco & Eve Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair and Scalp Mask 212ml Coco & Eve Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair and Scalp Mask 212ml
description: Here to protect against three major signs of lacklustre lengths – loss of shine, strength and volume – Coco & Eve’s innovative Youth Revive Pro Youth Hair & Scalp Mask gives your locks a new lease of luscious life. Featuring a PRO-VITALI B honey blend, retinol and probiotics, the skin care-inspired concoction nourishes the scalp and strands for a healthier and stronger-looking finish. The five-minute mask also helps to balance excess sebum and oils – meaning fewer hair-wash days on the horizon (hurrah!). Suitable for all hair types and textures, the once-weekly formula provides your locks with a much-needed surge of moisture, resulting in less breakage and visible split ends; all while inducing a silk-like softness and shine.
how_to_use: After shampooing, evenly distribute a generous amount of product from the scalp to the lengths and ends of the hair. Leave on for 5-10 minutes, then rinse with warm water. Use 1-2 times a week.

name: BLEACH LONDON Champagne Super Toner Kit BLEACH LONDON Champagne Super Toner Kit
description: Champagne-hued locks are officially chic – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Champagne Toner Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add pearly blonde, golden tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool. It will last for around 16-20 washes on pre-lightened hair.
how_to_use: Lasts for around 16-20 washes. For use on pre-lightened hair. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH LONDON TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH LONDON DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH LONDON BEACH LIGHTS to lighten hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Hair condition, porosity, length, fineness, shade and any previous treatments. The final effect will depend on your current hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring. Follow with BLEACH LONDON LIVE FOREVER SHAMPOO every other wash to maintain your sparkling tone.

name: OUAI Fine Hair Conditioner Refill 946ml OUAI Fine Hair Conditioner Refill 946ml
description: Formulating a conditioner so featherweight it replenishes moisture without weighing down your fine hair, meet the Fine Hair Conditioner 2.0. This velveteen conditioner boosts the body of your hair as it softens and smooths each strand, so you can spend less time scrunching or teasing and more time chilling. It’s infused with hair-strengthening hydrolysed keratin and biotin to promote thick, frizz-free lengths, while a blend of hemp seed extract and chia seed oil grants lasting, weightless(!) hydration to your fine hair. Their iconic ‘Mercer Street’ fragrance is the perfect finishing touch; orange melds with peony, magnolia, jasmine and musk for a beautiful scent even after the suds leave your strands. Available in a chic 300ml bottle or a 946ml refill pouch - that's the equivalent of just over three full-sized bottles - this must-have new launch is as chic as it is sustainable too.
how_to_use: Work through wet, freshly washed hair and then rinse.

name: KEVIN MURPHY BLONDE ANGEL Treatment 250ml KEVIN MURPHY BLONDE ANGEL Treatment 250ml
description: If your bleached, highlighted or grey strands are straying into discoloured, yellow-orange territory, you can banish brassiness for good with KEVIN.MURPHY’s Blonde.Angel. A trusty treatment, this conditioning concoction moisturises and softens hair while enhancing, reviving and brightening its tone for refreshed, clean and vibrant colour. The luscious formula is enriched with sunflower seed extract, which guards against colour fade and brassiness; olive oil extract, which hydrates, restores and repairs thanks to its vitamin A, vitamin E and biotin content; lavender flower, a natural antioxidant known for its moisturising, cleansing and balancing qualities; and brazil nut extract, rich in vitamin E to help moisturise and smooth hair while preventing dryness. It’s perfect used after KEVIN.MURPHY’s Blonde.Angel Wash.

name: Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Cleanse Shampoo 250ml Hair By Sam McKnight Rich Cleanse Shampoo 250ml
description: The time has come to skinify your hair care rituals with Sam McKnight's deeply replenishing shampoo... the ultimate wash day essential. Scalp care goes strand in strand with healthy hair, which is why finding the right shampoo to care for your hair is of the utmost importance. The Rich Cleanse Nourishing Shampoo from Sam McKnight has been designed to care for coloured, thirsty and damaged lengths. Naturally derived mild surfactants sweep away excess oil, dirt and product residue without drying out your scalp, making this gentle shampoo a must for those with sensitive scalps. A quinoa pro complex and conditioning plant keratin have been combined to create a nourishing powerhouse. These hair heroes are rich in amino acids that leave brittle hair feeling instantly softened. Finished with moisturising and shine-inducing sugar beet and Sam's signature botanical fine fragrance to start you on your healthy hair journey.

name: Augustinus Bader The Conditioner 150ml Augustinus Bader The Conditioner 150ml
description: On the hunt for a conditioner that hydrates hair without leaving it lank or weighed down? Look no further than Augustinus Bader’s The Conditioner with TCF8. Exceptionally hardworking, this hydrator does more than just add moisture; the amnio-acid rich ‘TFC8 Complex’ also helps to repair heat and colour damage, tame frizz, detangle knots and build body for a truly luxurious mane. Alongside this, oat kernel oil supports the elasticity of the hair cuticle (easing breakage that can typically come from putting your hair up or your hair rubbing against your clothes) while keeping strands plump and hydrated. To boost volume even further, there’s maca root extract, which stimulates hair growth right from the follicle, while also protecting and strengthening strands from root to tip.

name: Philip KingsleyFlaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Scalp Toner 250ml Philip KingsleyFlaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Scalp Toner 250ml
description: Water-based and fragrance-free, this clear formula provides immediate and long-lasting relief from flaking and itchy scalps. With continued use alongside the wider Flaky/Itchy Scalp range, this prevents the recurrence of flakes and build-up of dead skill cells due to its anti-microbial and anti-flaking formula. Simply apply to damp, freshly washed hair and work into the scalp with fingertips. There’s no need to rinse, simply let this leave-in product do the hard work for you.

Do not rinse. Use cotton buds to apply to difficult to reach sensitive areas of the scalp. Can also be applied to dry hair to refresh.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Instant De-Frizzer 95ml Living Proof No Frizz Instant De-Frizzer 95ml
description: Frizz-smoothing is a notoriously tricky business – most anti-frizz products rely on silicones to lubricate the hair’s surface and weigh strands down, which helps to minimise friction but ceases to be as effective when things get hot and humid. Frizz is the product of these two factors; when hair is exposed to humidity or dampness, the moisture is absorbed into the hair fibre, causing the cuticle to flare out – as the strands rub against one another, the increase in friction results in frizz, so a true solution must successfully tackle both of these issues. Living Proof took it upon themselves to devise the biggest and most innovative anti-frizz breakthrough; OFPMA – the proprietary technology in Living Proof’s No Frizz products – which coats each strand more evenly than silicones, so moisture is unable to penetrate the hair shaft. It also helps to smooth each strand’s texture, so friction is minimised and frizz is conquered. Also in the Instant De-Frizzer is a clever blend of oils which replicate the functions of those found naturally in the hair, plus conditioning agents to soften and seal the cuticle. The result? Sleek, smooth and frizz-free locks.
how_to_use: For medium to thick hair, hold canister 6-10" away and spray on dry hair in a sweeping motion. Smooth hair with hands or comb. For fine hair, focus on applying from mid-lengths to ends. To spot treat, spray in hand and apply to specific sections.
ingredient: Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Alcohol Denat., Isohexadecane, Isododecane, PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Propylene Glycol Dibenzoate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Octafluoropentyl Methacrylate (OFPMA), Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Linoleamidopropyl Dimethylamine Dimer Dilinoleate, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Lagenaria Sphaerica Seed Oil, Orbignya Oleifera Seed Oil, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Oleyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, C13-15 Alkane, Fragrance/Parfum, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool, Coumarin, Geraniol

Free from ammonia and peroxide, this semi-permanent (it lasts for up to ten shampoos!) hair colour won’t damage your tresses; quite the contrary, it boasts a deep conditioning base that’s brimming with hydrating ingredients that leave your hair soft, shiny and illuminated. Have your pick of 11 shades, including the ‘Sheer’ variation that can be used to tailor the tone of other colours to perfectly match your hair.

name: BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Kit BLEACH LONDON Fade To Grey Kit
description: Charcoal grey is officially chic – and there’s no better way to nail this trend than BLEACH London’s Fade To Grey Kit. A nourishing semi-permanent toner, this covetable kit contains all you need to add grey, slatey sheen tones to pre-lightened hair. There’s a tube of colourant, a bottle of developer lotion (peroxide) and a deeply conditioning treatment mask to care for coloured strands, as well as a pair of plastic gloves and an instruction leaflet to keep things as foolproof as possible. As if all that wasn’t enough, the collection is completely cruelty-free and vegan – like all of BLEACH’s products – so you can feel caring as well as über-cool.
how_to_use: Instructions included in box. This semi-permanent dye will last for around 16-20 washes. If your hair isn’t already blonde, use BLEACH London TOTAL BLEACH, BLEACH London DIY DIP DYE or BLEACH London BEACH LIGHTS to lighten your hair first. The colour achieved and the length of its duration can be influenced by many factors including: Condition of hair, previous treatments, hair colour, porosity, length and fineness of hair. The final effect will depend on your hair colour. Best results will be seen on already bleached or highlighted blonde hair. You may need more than one pack if your hair is long, thick or hasn’t been dyed before. It’s always a good idea to have another pack to hand just in case one runs out before you’re finished colouring.

description: A brand that needs no introduction when it comes to its hair-boosting capabilities, RevitaLash has now branched out with their pioneering Thickening Shampoo, which features ingredients to optimise scalp health and create the ideal environment for lustrous, revitalised lengths. Working to cleanse and fortify hair while protecting against environmental stressors, this phyto-enriched formula improves hair shaft thickness so that hair feels fuller, looks thicker and feels healthier overall. It uses flax protein to protect against breakage; loquat leaf to help with thinning; willow bark to gently exfoliate and stimulate the scalp; antioxidant-rich ginseng to protect both hair and scalp; and jojoba seed oil to fortify the scalp and hair cuticles. Colour safe, vegan and cruelty-free, this formula is set to be astonishingly transformative for weak, brittle, thinning hair.

name: NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Volume Shampoo NatureLab TOKYO Perfect Volume Shampoo
description: If your hairs looking limp and in need of an oomph boost then reach straight for NatureLab TOKYOs Volume Shampoo a build-up dissolving and root-lifting cocktail of plant extracts and proteins to amplify lift and build body. A petal-pink cleanser that smells like Japans cherry blossoms, this expertly blended shampoo is a boon for limp hair that requires reviving. Starring apple extracts to replenish the scalp and maintain equilibrium (they're great for inhibiting hair loss), alongside rice and soy proteins to add weightless moisture and fortify delicate strands so your hair becomes thicker and less prone to breakage, this treats every strand with the same care you'd show to your prized silks and cashmeres. The addition of sakura extract great for preserving your colour and optimising brightness makes this the ultimate threat for flat, brittle and flyaway manes. We're calling it a 'hair lift' in a bottle... Want to top up your bottle without getting another bottle? You can now invest in refills; double the portion of a bottle but with 85% less plastic than two full-size bottles, these eco-friendly pouches are as good for the earth as they are your purse.

name: Function of Beauty Wavy Hair Shampoo 325ml Function of Beauty Wavy Hair Shampoo 325ml
description: Perfect for tresses that fall somewhere between straight and curly, the Wavy HairShampoo cleanses hair and lays the foundation for stronger, elastic hair that maximises the three boosters of your choice. Powered by fermented rice water, this sulfate-free, 100% vegan shampoo strengthens weak strands and improves elasticity. It gently foams to cleanse away daily impurities, product build-up and excess oil, while the silicones help to provide slip and protect hair from heat – don't worry, their top-class range doesn't weigh down hair! Not to mention the exclusive 'Nude Peach' fragrance bursts with notes of peach nectar, jasmine and lemon zest, making it an absolute sensorial treat to massage into your scalp and transform your shower into a spa. Whatever three boosters you choose – from anti-frizz and deep conditioning to strengthening – this cleanser is more than your average shampoo, instead, it's exactly what you want it to be.

description: If your hair is feeling tired, overworked or dry, it's time to give it some TLC with the impressively diligent Rice Water Protein + Moisture Strengthening Treatment by Briogeo. Suitable for absolutely all hair types (thought particularly potent for restoring dry, damaged or chemically-treated manes), this intensive weekly treatment combines a two part formula that together utilise a unique set of natural and vegan ingredients. To strengthen hair right from the cuticle, look to the ‘Proprietary Rice Protein Complex’, which undoes damage andprevents further damage from taking place. To hydrate, there’s fatty acid-rich rosehip oil which not only injects moisture but also helps to reduce the appearance of split ends for an all over more glossy mane. And to nourish hair, there’s restorative B vitamins and antioxidant-rich algae extract.

Rinse out and then apply the Don’t Despair, Repair!™ Deep Conditioning Mask to complete your intensive treatment process. For best results, use weekly.

name: SILKE London Cleopatra Hair Ties SILKE London Cleopatra Hair Ties
description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...

ingredient: Specially selected super elastic interior, 100% pure silk exterior.

name: Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml Living Proof No Frizz Conditioner 236ml
description: The ultimate mane-taming follow up to No Frizz Shampoo, Living Proof’s No Frizz Conditioner has a weightless, detangling formula to minimise hair stress when styling, whilst nourishing strands to preserve precious pigment and leave your locks feeling super-soft, shiny and ‘slippery’. Powered by the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA), which helps block humidity 70% more effectively than traditional oils and silicones whilst repelling environmental grime and pollutants – this heavenly hair-hydrator is a must-have in the war against frizz – rendering tresses more meek, mild and manageable. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.
how_to_use: Start with No Frizz Shampoo. Apply No Frizz Conditioner to clean, wet hair, focusing on midshaft to ends. Spread evenly throughout hair. Rinse. Follow with one of Living Proof's No Frizz styling products.

name: WetBrush Go Green Mini Detangler - Pink WetBrush Go Green Mini Detangler - Pink
description: Just when we thought we couldn’t love Wet Brush any more, they release a conveniently mini version of the ultra-effective, planet-friendly Go Green Detangler. With all the incredible hair-smoothing qualities of the classic Wet Brush you know (and likely love), this palm-sized brush has one fundamental difference: it’s biodegradable! Made from plant starch and ergonomically designed with a sleek, shiny handle, this is ideal for eliminating knots on both wet and dry locks. This is all due to the revolutionary Intelliflex technology; the thin, strong yet super flexible bristles have brains yielding or unbending as required to glide through tangles with next-to-no tugging, tearing or tress distress. What’s more, the ball-tip bristles are perfect for gently stimulating circulation near the scalp, to better feed your follicles and encourage new growth. But wait, it gets better when you’re ready to replace your brush, you’ll be happy to know that it will naturally biodegrade within five years!

name: Ceremonia Aceite de Moska Scalp Oil 60ml Ceremonia Aceite de Moska Scalp Oil 60ml
description: As Ceremonia knows well, healthy locks start with a healthy scalp — and this nourishing oil is the perfect tonic to provide yours with some much needed TLC and it even promotes growth. Inspired by the Dominican Republic’s long-cherished Aceite de Moska hair remedy, this star product is packed with eight natural oils to tackle excess sebum and build-up, while moisturising the scalp and magnifying shine. Meadowfoam seed, chia seed, and babassu oils work to strengthen locks and repair split ends, alongside patauá oil and maracujá oil for glossy tresses and reduced flakiness. In essence, there’s not much this healing farm-to-lab formula can’t do — time to start practising your best hair flick.
how_to_use: Shake well. Pre-shower apply directly to the scalp and massage throughout. Leave on for 10-15 minutes. Shampoo hair, repeat as needed, or leave on overnight for enhanced results and rinse in the morning. Use 1-2 x per week. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. For an extra dry scalp, massage Aceite de Moska directly onto the scalp, leave overnight and wash it out the next day.

name: Sol de Janeiro Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Repair Treatment (Various Sizes) Sol de Janeiro Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Repair Treatment (Various Sizes)
description: Majorly overdue a trim? Restore dry, damaged strands (and impress your hairdresser when you next see them) with Sol de Janeiro's restorative mask: the Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Treatment. The decadently rich formula harnesses a trio of Brazilian butters to make light work of tangles, fend against damage and effectively smooth split ends... The butters in question are Cupuaçu, Murumuru, and Tucumã - deeply hydrating ingredients that provide nourishment and increase resistance against breakage! It's also formulated with their patented SOL Seal Technology (plant-based keratin micro-capsules) to strengthen your hair as it repairs damage by ionically bonding your split ends. Don't believe us? In a clinical split end repair study conducted by an independent 3rd party lab, it was seen to mend up to 96%(!) of split ends when used as directed. Expect healthy-looking, smooth and shiny strands that won't feel weighed down in the slightest!
how_to_use: Set aside some quality time for you and your strands... After cleansing hair, apply the mask to wet hair, evenly coating from root to tip, concentrating on the ends. Leave on for 10 minutes (or more) before rinsing thoroughly. For best results use once a week or once every other week, or any time your hair needs a boost of repair & hydration - after excessive heat styling, a colouring treatment or straightening treatment.

name: Slip Pure Silk Skinny Scrunchies (Various Colours) Slip Pure Silk Skinny Scrunchies (Various Colours)
description: Made from a carefully chosen elastic tie with a sumptuous silk covering, Slip's Skinny Scrunchies minimise damage while looking totally chic. Get ready to upgrade your updo in more ways than one. Crafted from the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme, the Skinny Scrunchie is a must-add to your hair styling rituals. Whether you're creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate 'do, this sumptuous silk leaves no trace of kinks or creases. What's more, they're kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that there's no damage or breakage. Forget your LBD... this Little Black Scrunchie is a hair wardrobe staple.
how_to_use: The multi award-winning slip skinnies are the perfect size for everyday use and won't leave creases in your delicate hair.
ingredient: Made from 100% highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk with a thickness of 22 momme (exclusive of elastic)

name: ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong (26mm) ghd Curve Classic Curl Tong (26mm)
description: Sleek red carpet-worthy locks, loose waves, bouncy curls - this versatile tong is the must-have tool to mastering a bevy of different styles, whether your hair is long, short, thick or thin. With a 26mm barrel and spring-activated lever, it creates consistent medium-sized curls from root to tip. As with all of ghd's covetable range, the tong adheres to the brand's research-backed optimum temperature of 185ºC - cooler temperatures deliver poorer styling results while hotter ones can cause irreversible, unnecessary hair damage. This is regulated and maintained through clever ultra-zone technology, which recognises each section of hair and adapts the heat accordingly. Other clever features include a cool tip to safely hold your hair in place as you style, a ceramic coating to allow for smoother curling and a professional length swivel cable to grant flexibility and easy reach. It takes safety very seriously indeed too: there's a safety stand to secure it on a hard surface when you're not styling, and - perfect for the forgetful among us - an automatic sleep mode that turns the device off after 30 minutes. Beautiful curls and healthy hair? Two words: No brainer.
how_to_use: Before use, spritz your hair generously with heat protectant. We recommend ghd heat protect spray. For long-lasting, classic curls, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then open the clamp and flat wrap the hair around the barrel. Close the clamp to secure the end of the hair in place. Wait 5-8 seconds and then open the clamp to release. For soft, luxe waves, section your strands into approximately 2cm wide pieces, then twist wrap the hair around the barrel. Hold the hair in place for 5-8 seconds (the clamp may not close completely due to the twisted section of hair being thicker) and then release. When finished, leave the tong to cool then fold the cord in the same way as it arrived in the original packaging. Where possible, avoid wrapping it around the body of the tong or hanging it by the cord as this could cause damage. The tong has a UK three-pin plug. Packaging may vary.

name: Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 75ml Philip Kingsley Flaky/Itchy Scalp Anti-Dandruff Shampoo 75ml
description: Cleansing and clarifying, this anti-dandruff shampoo has been specially formulated to remove the irritation and potential embarrassment that dry, flaky scalps too often bring. Developed by ‘The Hair Doctor’, Philip Kingsley, whose work centred around scalp (as well as hair) heath, this formula was originally created for Sir Laurence Olivier. Unlike other dandruff treatments, Flaky Itchy Scalp Shampoo does not dry out the hair or strip it of colour, gently cleansing with specialised ingredients instead and removing build up and irritation, so effectively that 99% of those tested in a consumer trial said that it cleared their flaky scalp. With a delicate apple fragrance, this can be used every day as your main shampoo, or in conjunction with the shampoo recommended for your hair texture. Available in travel and full sizes, you need never be without your favourite hair saviour...
how_to_use: Apply to wet hair Lather well with a gentle kneading of the scalp Rinse and repeat if necessary Follow with the appropriate Philip Kingsley conditioner and scalp toner Use daily to cleanse your scalp and thereafter at regular intervals as required
ingredient: Aqua/Water/Eau, TEA-Lauryl Sulfate, Lauryl Betaine, PEG-4 Rapeseedamide, Piroctone Olamine, Citric Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Chloride.

name: ghd Oval Dressing Brush ghd Oval Dressing Brush
description: For soft and groomed tresses, ghd's Oval Dressing Brush is The One. Crafted with clever anti-static nylon bristles that reach deeper into hair than natural bristles, this strand saviour detangles at the root while distributing your scalp's natural conditioning oils down your tresses for optimum, effortless shine. The bristles are grounded in a rubber cushion pad, which has breathable air holes to allow for flexibility and comfort when brushing at the scalp. To make things extra easy (and therefore gaining multiple brownie points from us!) a non-slip handle ensures plenty of control while you dress out your mane.
how_to_use: Brush through your hair from root to tip. This is not to be used with a hair dryer.

name: Pattern Leave-in Conditioner 88.7ml Pattern Leave-in Conditioner 88.7ml
description: Say goodbye to your gorgeous frizz halo with the Leave-In Conditioner that adds floods of moisture with that little bit of oomph needed to nourish curls after your wash routine but before styling. As with all PATTERN hair care, the Leave-In Conditioner is free of sls/sles, parabens, formaldehyde... the list goes on. But what it has got is a natural blend of oils - we're talking coconut, sweet almond, tea tree, avocado - and honey to deliver moisture and lock it in at the same time. Not only does this nourishing formula make it easier to detangle your mane but its lightweight texture adds soft definition with a light hold. Leaving a light floral scent comprised of neroli, rose and patchouli, make dry, frizzy hair a thing of the past and prepare to see your best curls and coils yet.

Pro tip: Cocktail in a few drops of PATTERN Argan Oil Hair Serum with Leave-In Conditioner for an extra moisture boost on wet hair. Also works well on dry hair & frizzy hair to tame flyaways & offer a light hold.

description: If, like us, you've spent years trying to perfect a salon-worthy blow dry, then allow us to solve all your styling woes at once with Sam McKnight's new hero. Sam McKnight's Save The Do Blow Dry Style Starter is a three in one multi-tasker that preps, styles and protects your hair as you create your desired look. description: Living Proof’s No Frizz Shampoo has a rich, nourishing formula that lathers beautifully to eliminate product build-up, dirt and residue, whilst the brand’s patented ‘Healthy Hair Molecule’ (OFPMA) works to weightlessly block humidity. Painstakingly developed with never-before-used hair care ingredients and technologies, Living Proof abandoned the usual hair care ‘recipes’, choosing instead to approach aesthetics from pharmaceutical, medical and biotech perspectives – with consistent advice and consultation from some of the world’s greatest stylists and industry veterans. The outcome? The happy fact that A-List-worthy hair now comes in bottles.

Part of Davines ‘Heart of Glass’ edit – which derives its name from a famous song from the 80s, sang by a very blonde artist who has become an icon – this collection of products are designed to highlight the beauty of blonde hair, both natural and bleached, lightened and dyed; or hair that has been exposed to sunlight, the frequent use of the brushes or straighteners, all elements that could weaken its fibre. On a mission to preserve the planet’s vital biodiversity, each hair care ‘family’ (Heart of Glass, NOUNOU and so on), represents an extract under threat, so by choosing to use this shampoo, you’re supporting the globe and its varied inhabitants – from plants to people!

description: Perfect for tresses that fall somewhere between straight and curly, the Wavy Hair Conditioner enhances glass-like glossiness and lays the foundation for stronger, moisturised hair that maximises the three boosters of your choice. Powered by argan oil, this vegan conditioner helps with managability while increasing levels of head-turning shine. The formula is a complex blend of silicones and conditioning agents designed to provide slip and protect hair from heat – and don't worry, their top-class range doesn't weigh down hair. Not to mention the exclusive 'Nude Peach' fragrance bursts with notes of peach nectar, jasmine and lemon zest, making it an absolute sensorial treat to massage into your scalp and transform your shower into a spa. Whatever three boosters you choose – from anti-frizz and deep conditioning to strengthening – this conditioner is more than your average nourishing must-have, instead, it's exactly what you want it to be.

description: Made from a carefully chosen elastic tie with a sumptuous silk covering, Slip’s Skinny Scrunchies minimise damage while looking totally chic. Get ready to upgrade your updo in more ways than one. Crafted from the highest grade (6A) long fibre mulberry silk, with a thickness of 22 momme, the Skinny Scrunchie is a must-add to your hair styling rituals. Whether you’re creating a ballet bun, the highest high ponytail, tossing your hair in a topknot or creating an intricate ’do, this sumptuous silk leaves no trace of kinks or creases. What’s more, they’re kind to your delicate locks, ensuring that there’s no damage or breakage.
how_to_use: The multi award-winning slip skinnies are the perfect size for everyday use and won't leave creases in your delicate hair.

name: Kitsch Microfiber Hair Towel (Various Colours) Kitsch Microfiber Hair Towel (Various Colours)
description: Were sure youve heard that towels arent great for wrapping your soggy strands with thanks to the fact that they cause unnecessary damage but not with the Microfiber Hair Towel! Gentle, quick-drying and for all hair types, you need this accessory in your bathroom, stat. Kitschs Microfiber Hair Towel which comes in three patterns is a wet-hair game changer. Made to suit frizzy, curly and straight hair of all lengths, this nifty towel is quick-drying and light on your neck thanks to the microfibre material. And dont be fooled this microfibre towel is not like any youve felt before (we know the feeling!), its irresistibly soft and gentle on both your skin and your hair.
how_to_use: Wrap this ultra-soft towel around your lengths to provide comfort during your post-shower routines.

name: KEVIN MURPHY YOUNG AGAIN WASH 250ml KEVIN MURPHY YOUNG AGAIN WASH 250ml
description: Let your locks relive their vibrant, lustrous youth with KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Wash, a restorative, gently cleansing shampoo that grants softening, shine-enhancing and age-defying benefits. Like skin care for your hair, Kevin Murphy’s professional-standard range utilises the finest ingredients to deliver strength and health to your strands, ensuring that they look their very best – even if you’re growing up a little quicker than you’d like (aren’t we all!) Enriched with a complex of amino acids, orchid and lotus extracts to strengthen, as well as baobab seed oil to smooth frizziness and impart much-needed moisture, this lusciously natural formula is ideal for restoring youthful lustre to dry, brittle or damaged hair. Brimming with antioxidants, the gentle cleanser also guards against colour fade and keeps tresses defended from the often harmful effects of the elements. Your locks will be left sleek, soft and refreshed – without being weighed down. Use before KEVIN.MURPHY’s Young.Again.Rinse for the best results.
