name: BLEACH LONDON Tangerine Dream Super Cool Colour 150ml BLEACH LONDON Tangerine Dream Super Cool Colour 150ml
description: Ensure that your mane is anything but run-of-the-mill (without the colour commitment) with BLEACH London’s Super Cool Colour, a non-permanent hair colour cream mask that transforms bleached and toned tresses. In just 30 minutes, this rich, luscious mask can reveal a rainbow of bold, chic shades. From beautifully bright ‘The Big Pink’ to perfect pastels ‘Awkward Peach’ and ‘Blullini’, to brilliantly bold turquoise ‘Washed Up Mermaid’, there’s a shade to suit every aesthetic. Each shade has a different lifecycle - the more subtle 'Rosé' will fade in 1-3 washes, while the ultra-bright 'I Saw Red' lasts from 3-30 washes - so be sure to check before you invest; plus, the colour and fade will vary depending upon the tone and porosity of your hair. Sure to satisfy the wildest colour chameleons and indecisive individuals, get ready to explore your every shade craving. Like the entire BLEACH range, Super Cool Colour is completely cruelty-free and vegan – just another reason we love it. Want to get the best out of your new-found colour? Stock up on the corresponding toning shampoo and conditioner to maintain vibrancy!
how_to_use: Wearing gloves, apply generously to shampooed, towel dried hair. Massage or comb through mid-lengths and ends to ensure you cover all the hair evenly, leave to develop for 30 minutes. Rinse out with lukewarm water and style as desired. For best results apply on very light blonde, bleached hair. Colour may vary depending on existing tone and porosity of hair. One bottle is suitable for short hair or colouring freshly bleached and toned roots. For shoulder-length hair you'll need two bottles. For long hair that's below your shoulders, you'll need three to four bottles. If your hair is very thick we recommend adding an extra bottle.

name: Pacifica Vegan Collagen Hydrating Shampoo 355ml Pacifica Vegan Collagen Hydrating Shampoo 355ml
description: Whether you’ve overdone it with the hot tools or are just predisposed to drier lengths, this nourishing but weightless daily shampoo is here to relieve your dry hair and deliver mega moisture. Whether you’re suffering from damage, breakage, split ends or just dry strands, this shampoo works to smooth your lengths whatever your hair type. Infused with lab-crafted vegan collagen to mimic naturally occurring hair peptides, these restore strands' strength and elasticity quickly. Not only here to reinforce hair, the addition of the provitamin B5, avocado oil and jasmine extract helps to smooth lengths, lock in moisture and deliver some serious gloss.
how_to_use: Apply to hair at the scalp and massage. Rinse clean. For best results, follow with Vegan Collagen Hydrating Conditioner. Warning: Do not use directly in the eye. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. External use only.

name: Aveda Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Aveda Smoother 100ml Aveda Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Aveda Smoother 100ml
description: All hair types can reap the rewards of Aveda’s smoothing pre-style treatment… formulated for all hair types and textures, from fine, medium and thick manes to straight 1A’s, wavy 2A-2C’s and curly 3A’s-3C’s and colour and chemically-treated hair. Transform your tresses with the revamped formula of the Smooth Infusion Style-Prep Smoother, infused with sand ginger to naturally protect vulnerable strands from the drying effects of UV rays. It’s smooth hair from here on out thanks to the botanical smoothing oil blend of Kalahari melon seed oil and Tamanu oil that conditions your cuticles and leaves your hair with a lust-worthy softness and shine. If you find yourself constantly battling against frizz-inducing humidity, you can thank Aveda for the invisible plant polymer shield that cloaks every single strand to repel water without the need for silicone. Finished with Aveda’s own ‘Pure-Fume Aroma’ of bergamot, palmarosa and Australian sandalwood to scent your tresses with an indulgent floral fragrance, we’re struggling to find a reason not to make this a mainstay in our styling routines. Available in a sized-to-try 25ml and shelfie-worthy 100ml, you need never be without this anti-frizz serum saviour.
how_to_use: To prep hair for styling, work a small amount of product in hands and apply through damp hair. Style as desired.

The time has come to up your 'cool quota' and reveal effortlessly styled locks. So, you've perfected the sexily tousled, slightly dishevelled look with the Cool Girl Barely There Texture Mist... but how about creating long-lasting volume and hold? Enter: the Cool Girl Volume Blow Dry Foam. Boasting a light hold and a smoothing touch, this blow dry partner makes light work of your salon-worthy blowout. Sam McKnight's chic styling staple will be your new go-to to achieve weightless volume and effortlessly tousled locks, finished with an irresistibly chic fragrance. It's time to go big or go home...

name: Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Conditioner 50ml Oribe Hair Alchemy Resilience Conditioner 50ml
description: Reverse time on any damage dealt to your mane with Oribe's hydrating and restorative conditioner. Taking a preventative approach to weak, damaged hair, this revitalising formula is brimming with botanical extracts – including strengthening chia seed and active antioxidant-enhancing bio-fermented bamboo leaf.  Add to this magic potion extracts of daisy and honeysuckle and expect hair to be fortified from roots to tip, no matter how brittle. If you thought Oribe's signature complex (of watermelon, lychee and edelweiss flower extract) was good, this curative blend has just upped the ante on building strong, resilient hair by forming a protective scaffold around hair strands to boost cuticle strength. A multi-action hyaluronic acid complex injects a dose of moisture and increases elasticity, while green tea and plant polysaccharides protect from environmental stressors by warding off any pollution particles that are tempted to sit on your precious locks. Just one rinse of this super hydrating formula will leave your hair feeling strong, smooth and soft.

name: SILKE London Coco Hair Ties SILKE London Coco Hair Ties
description: The brainchild of a London hairstylist, SILKE London’s brand-founder Maria was frustrated – waking up each day to frizzy, fragile hair (and a pillowcase strewn with split ends). The solution? 100% pure silk, which not only respects hair and reduces risk of breakage, but also helps to smooth and enhance shine so your locks stay strong, long and lustrous. Each pack boasts six silk-wrapped bobbles, to effortlessly secure your ballet bun, high pony or pigtails (whatever your hair’s thickness) – just choose from three colours: ‘Cleopatra’ (classic black), ‘Coco’ (pretty champagne-pink) or ‘Frida’ (with a rainbow of rich, sumptuous jewelled hues). As well as looking gorgeous (as great on your wrist as in your hair) SILKE Hair Ties glide against hair, eliminating the friction, clawing and snapping of abrasive traditional elastics, to prevent damage, breakages and split-ends. Redesigned with your feedback in mind, these are the best hair ties you'll ever own...

ingredient: Specially selected super elastic interior, 100% pure silk exterior.

name: VIRTUE Recovery Conditioner 200ml VIRTUE Recovery Conditioner 200ml
description: The Virtue Recovery Conditioner is expertly constructed to target dry, damaged hair types. Blended with first-of-its-kind Alpha Keratin 60ku®, the formula replenishes lost moisture to brittle strands that are in need of deep nourishment. Thanks to a high-performance composition made up of hydrolysed quinoa, baobab seed oil and grapefruit extract, the conditioner infuses the hair with softness, helping to increase manageability whilst summoning a glass-like shine. Promoting a visibly stronger appearance, the conditioner is topped with a rich blend of creamy coconut, tropical yuzu extracts and warm woody nuances. Pair with the Virtue Recovery Shampoo for optimum results.
how_to_use: Apply a quarter-sized amount to wet hair, from mid-shaft to ends; leave in for 1-3 minutes before rinsing thoroughly. For best results, prep hair with your favourite Virtue Shampoo.
